review_text: Great place to stay a lot of things to do in waking distance. Located in the heart of downtown
Had a great time! Charming place to stay in a great location.

Great neighborhood to stay in. Lots of beautiful victorian houses and walkable to shops and restaurants and about a 15 minute walk to Old Port. The porch was nice too for relaxing while taking a break from all the walking.
It was a cute little apartment in a convenient location close to the west end. Perfect for our family, very cozy. We enjoyed hanging out together on the porch.
Great stay! Host was helpful and offered an earlier check in which was a nice surprise.
Cool spot. Clean and was right where we wanted to be as first time visitors to Portland.
Great place, had everything I needed. The location is fantastic, easy walk to downtown and a bunch of fantastic restautrants
Cozy spot in the heart of Portland. Host was super about being available for any questions or issues. Cute apartment with a comfortable bed… quiet side street.
Perfect location and a super responsive and helpful host! Highly recommend!
Such a beautiful place! Everything was easy to use and set up so nicely
Wonderful place and very well located, host very responsive and helpful. Definitely, I would recommend their condo,if you want to explore Portland.
Steve, the co-host, was extremely responsive and great to communicate with! We enjoyed our stay in Portland :) The condo needs to be renovated which is why I’m giving 4 stars not 5.

The apartment is cozy & nicely appointed, the location quiet and safe. It would have been nice to know more about parking before booking, better to judge whether a hotel with parking included would better suit us. Detailed information in the unit about the city & advice & a map about parking were helpful. Nonetheless we had to circle the area several times in the evening to find a spot and then move the car in the morning to avoid a possible ticket. Parking in the near-by garage costs $40/night. This of course isn't controlled by the hosts for whom we have only praise. We appreciated the coffee, tea, snacks, and even more Steven's immediate responses to our communications. We had difficulty regulating the temperature, but found many extra blankets and comforters, so were not cold. We would not recommend this venue to guests planning on using the sofa-bed, which is decidedly uncomfortable. We very much appreciated Steven's extending our check-out time, a generous gesture.
Cute and clean place, super close to arts district and walkable to a ton of restaurants!
Such an amazing location. You’re right next to everything. Shalini and her husband were super attentive, quick with communication, and gave great recs.
Pleasant stay. Very clean and nice area!
Great spot excellent hosts!
Great location!

Very cool and spacious apartment (loved the brick!) walking distance to anything in Old Port. We had a question about check in and the host responded immediately even though it was very late. Would stay again!
Great location for easy walking to the State Theater and everything else that Portland has to offer. Communication was terrific and place was very clean. We would definitely stay here again!
Great location near Portland shops and restaurants
Shalini’s place was perfect for our quick 1 night in Portland. Cozy, comfortable and within walking distance to downtown. Very clean space, and responsive host and co-host!

We needed a home base in the city walkable to the east end, west end and old port. This was a perfect location for that. Cohost Steve was proactive with messaging and responded within 5 minutes when I had a heating pump question (he was very kind, considering I hadn't read the detailed instructions that were left before I texted!).

what a great location! it was easy to get everywhere we wanted to go either by car or on foot. parking was a little tricky if we got back around dinner time but we were able to find a spot in close proximity without needing the garage that's nearby. we had a hard time with the lock box but figured it out after a few tries. we also had a hard time locking the keypad from the outside and we could've used some more instruction there. the place was clean with plenty of linens and blankets, a huge smart tv, and a great sized fridge. we traveled with our preschooler and infant. Steve was incredibly responsive and helpful. it was a great stay!

Very tidy, great location. The exceptional communication made us feel welcome. Price was great for the location.
The bed felt uneven, and though the mattress itself was comfortable, the odd unevenness was not ideal.
Despite that, would recommend!

Pros: The location is great and Steve was super quick to respond when we were struggling to locate the correct unit (it was dark, cold, and rainy… so we appreciated the responsiveness!). The unit is small but highly functional.
Cons: The bed is uncomfortable and loud/creaky and temperature was a challenge to regulate in the unit.
Great place. Walkable to downtown restaurants. Neat old Victorian feel!
a charming little place in the heart of downtown. very walkable and close to many great restaurants.
Cute spot & walkable to restaurants and shopping. We didn’t have issue finding street parking either!

Great space and located close enough for a 17 minute walk to old port! Shaking provided helpful information about parking, food recommendations, and made check in/ check out so easy! The space had everything we could’ve needed.
We had a wonderful stay, would visit again!

I only stayed one night to see a comedy show but the place was near everywhere you’d like to be in portland it was more cost effective than the holiday inn and can accommodate 2 couples quite well idk how the pull out couch was but if you dont hear people complaining in the morning it was probably pretty good. Next time i go to Portland i will see if this place is available.
Everything was exactly as listed. Very easy and close to everything. We took Ubers at night and it was only 4-5$ due to how close it was!

This place is so much cozier and more comfortable than the pictures depict! It is central to everything and the place was so charming!
We were not able to find parking, but comfortably and easily parked at the Westin up the street for $40 a night.
There were so many blankets and the heated blankets were such a great bonus.
Had the most wonderful time!
Super charming, very clean and close to everything. Definitely consider this spot if you’re visiting Portland!
Very nice stay!

Thoroughly enjoyed my stay. Host's provide clear instructions for check-in/locating the place as well as a plethora of recommendations on things to do/see in the area.
Convenient location and walkable neighborhood!
Parking can be tricky which was clearly detailed by hosts - recommend using the public lot at the end of the street for ease!

This was a great location to explore downtown Portland. Easily walkable to a number of restaurants, bars, coffee shops etc. More than enough space to relax and a nice private porch as well. Street parking took a few extra minutes but wasn't that bad and we used our car multiple times throughout the stay.
Great location, good a/c, lots of amenities, clean. On the downside, bed is creaky and uneven and stairs need a better handrail.
Super location and very well decorated

lovely home and very good location.
we adore portland and felt safe....parked easily and enjoyed all the moments of our stay. thank you so very much!
Amazing location. Loved the front porch, super quiet ans private.
Great place in a terrific location!
Shalani's place is well sotuated to walk to concerts at State Theater as well as walking to great restaurants on Commercial Street and that area.

Host was proactive with communication and provided great local recommendations and parking suggestions/tips after check in. In a nice location in the arts district and ~20/25min walk to other desirable areas for Portland. Parking was a bit tight arriving later in the afternoon when residents are coming back from work, would recommend arriving earlier and parking before 3pm if you can.
Great spot and walkable location. Perfect hub if you don’t have a car to be able to explore the surrounding area. Peaceful porch to sip coffee on. Hope to be back!

We were happy with the super convenient location! We could definitely hear sounds from the adjacent apartment and the upstairs flat so we were a bit uncomfortable with talking in the living room part. The shower was nice, as well as the AC! Ultimately it was a convenient location to use as a bedroom to explore Portland from, but if you want to lounge in the Airbnb, you might feel somewhat imposing on your neighbors life.

I’ve stayed here multiple times now, I think either 3 or 4. It’s cute, cozy, simple, all the amenities, and the host is great. One thing I love is how quiet it is there, for being right in the middle of the city. The outside porch is incredibly sweet and private and comfortable. This was, however the first time I’ve had to leave my parking spot, and then try to find parking later in the evening (around 11pm). That was a lesson learned. I ended up parking in a handicapped reserved spot because I couldn’t even get into the parking garage down the road. I didn’t sleep well worrying about it, and then got up early to look for a better spot. Luckily check out is late, so I went back and had a nice long morning nap. In the future, I will either only stay here if I’m only going out on foot, or I will leave my car and uber out.
Thank you again for sharing this space! I’ll be back again!

This place was so beautiful my fiancé and I just kept saying wow how beautiful this place is. It’s so cozy yet so elegant. The host was so amazing especially when we had to leave a day early. There are no word to describe how amazing they were. We are so appreciative with their kindness and their flexibility. I most defiantly recommend.
Shalini was extremely helpful with us needing an early checkin due to a wedding and was very accommodating. Thank you!!!
This condo was well stocked and in a great location in Portland Maine.

This was a great find! The place was clean and comfortable and did not disappoint. Everything we needed was there and more. The little touches like the snack basket, local guides and personalized recommendations were terrific! Our host was super responsive during check-in and check-out and even magically appeared to assist when we had a small issue with a door. One of our best AirBNB experiences - we would definitely recommend this place and would stay here again!
Fantastic stay!!

This is the area you want to stay to really enjoy Portland. Once you park, everything you will enjoy (food, drinks, art, music) is within walking distance. Don’t worry about too much planning; their welcome book is on point for food and drink recommendations. We moseyed our way to Pai Men Miyake, sauntered to a show at the Space gallery, then hit up choice drinks along Congress Street, and happily headed home. Yes home! The hosts thought of everything for a cozy comfy stay. Highly recommend.

This was a great airbnb for exploring Portland. We were able to walk most places which saved a lot on Ubers. The condo is comfortable and perfect for a home base while exploring Portland.
The place was clean and the AC was amazing, especially after walking around all day.
If you have a car parking can be an issueand you may have to pay to park, we did a few times.
The Hosts were very responsive and accommodating. They even game us gift card to a local restaurant because there was last minute construction on the street the day we got in.
We would definitely stay here again!

Great place to stay in Portland, perfect for a couple! Was close enough to walk anywhere we wanted to go. Steve was extremely helpful, even offering to drop off umbrellas since the weather was not cooperating! We had no issue with parking, always found a spot on the street. Thanks again Steve!
Enjoyed our stay for two nights while visiting Portland. Quick access to Congress St and can still walk downtown.

Cute apartment on a nice street in a great neighborhood. Queen bed in the bedroom was very comfortable and hosts were exceptionally quick to respond when we needed them. A couple issues, though… apartment was pretty small (just two rooms, really: one bedroom, and one room for everything else), which was fine for a couple nights but would be tough for a longer stay. Foldout couch was not super comfortable, but that’s typical of foldout couches. There were instructions not to flush anything down the toilet besides toilet paper, which we followed to the letter, but still had to plunge the toilet four times over the course of two days. We also had allergy problems from the dust (although frankly we are pretty sensitive and have allergy problems in most air bnbs). Lastly, parking is pretty tricky, as the street parking is heavily restricted. Other than these minor issues, we had a pretty comfortable stay!

Shalini’s condo unit has old world charm with all of the modern conveniences. The 2 rooms were spacious and well appointed. The porch was great to have as an extra room. We sat outside after a long day and it was very relaxing.
The house manual was very helpful with some great area recommendations.
We would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it.

the condo was nice private and had everything you needed
the only thing is parking is terrible.
Great location! Parking was the only challenge, as all of the street parking was filled.

The Victorian Condo was just as described. Comfortable and perfect for a one night stay. I appreciate them allowing for one night stays. Walkable to all of downtown and Old Port Portland. Restaurants a few blocks away.
Steve was very helpful in picking us up from Amtrak and taking us the next day via lighthouses to our cruise ship. Very knowledge and very nice. Special addition to staying in their condo.
Great place to stay in Portland! A walkable distance to many shops & restaurants & to the waterfront
It was perfect

The location was excellent, very close to many restaurants and a short walk to the port. It was easy to find the apartment and the check in was very simple and straightforward. The apartment was clean and everything was where it was supposed to be. However, there isn’t much shampoo and conditioner for many people or for a longer stay.

we have spent time in quite a few Airbnbs. this is well worth the price. walking distance to so much of Portland. great coffee shops, restaurants, dispensaries. Hiked in Freeport which was beautiful. would definitely recommend and likely would stay here in the future. the chowder at Gilbert's is amazing. tandem coffee is awesome too.l
Very satisfied. Able to walk everywhere. Cozy apartment. Beautiful neighborhood.
This was a beautiful and peaceful stay! The owners were very helpful and kind, would stay again.
we loved our stay!
Great location and very nice place!

Nice apartment in the center of town. We liked the balcony where we could eat our meals. Very good communication with the host who did everything to accomodate our wishes. We like Portland and surrounding state parks. We would like to visit again.
This was a great place to stay! The apartment was very clean and the hosts were welcoming and friendly. Small and cozy space great for exploring Portland.

Beautiful place! Co-host Steve was so responsive and always communicated with us from ck in to ck out! We walked everywhere from condo. We definitely fell in love with City of Portland! We will be back!

We did a quick overnight for a friends wedding with our 1 month old. Steve and Shalini wee accommodating with an early check in as feasible and had a pack and play in the apartment for us to use. The apartment was clean and well stocked with complimentary food and beverages. Would definitely stay here again!

This place did what it needed to. It would be good for a couple but with 4 adults it was tight. It’s a cozy apartment with things we needed but the bathroom was tight especially the shower. There was room for the provided air mattress and pull out couch. The location is decent and you can walk almost anywhere within 20 minutes. Parking was tough but the host guided us to available spots and told us the best places to keep the car. There was a book with recommendations as well as a basket full of snacks. Something to note, the outdoor patio is next to another residents bedroom so you have to be quiet. There’s also no smoking on the patio. I would stay here again.

This is a great little apartment that is exactly what I needed. I love the location and the host goes above and beyond to be helpful and friendly. This was my second stay and have it booked again for a later date. Definitely happy and would recommend.
We walked in and there was a lovely song playing in the kitchen! The space was warm and welcoming! Such an amazing place!

The place was cozy and clean, and the hosts were very responsive! We traveled here in March and the heated blankets on the bed were a nice touch. Snacks and coffee were left for us to enjoy while in Portland. Just a fair warning street parking is available but not always easy to find. So close to the State Theater and some great restaurants, too! Thanks for a comfortable stay.
fabulous all around. will stay again
A quiet and comfortable space 1 block away from great shops and restaurants. Perfect.

The local is hard to beat; right within walking distance of the PMA, shops and lots of great restaurants. Steve (co-host) reached out to us several times to make sure everything to was going okay and gave us flexibility with checking out. We didn’t end up needing anything but if we had it’s clear there was accommodations for that. Overall a great experience, we could easily see ourselves coming back here in the future to stay.
Extremely informative, helpful and very accommodating! We were so very happy with our experience.
Great place for a weekend in Portland! Quiet neighborhood and was able to rest but walkable distance to great places to enjoy town.
The kitchen was small and lacking a bit but it was a cute apartment. The porch was very peaceful. Parking was hard and annoying sometimes. Steve was very responsive.
We had a great time. Unit was very nice
Great location and fantastic host. Affordable and adorable. Highly recommend!
This was a wonderful time in Portland, Maine. I would request this place again.

We stayed for 1 night with 4 people and it was perfect! The neighborhood is full of beautiful brick buildings and it wasn’t noisy at all. We parked on Deering St. no problem and at no cost! You’ll see the number of the apartment on the front facing Deering St, but the entrance is right around the corner on Avon St :) The electric blanket was AMAZING (nice touch) and all of the amenities were there; first aid kit, light snacks, extra towels and linens, tv if wanted. Very clear instructions and flexible with check-in. We walked everywhere - lots of recommended restaurants, coffee, convenience stores nearby and a 20 minute walk to the water - it wasn’t bad, though, because there is so much to see on the stroll down there! Our friends said the pullout couch wasn’t bad, either. Would recommend!
Excellent host, got to talk to him at the end of our stay, lovely guy and a beautiful place.

This was a beautiful little Airbnb in a great location. Walking distance to many greats spots. Extremely nice and proactive hosts and very responsive. Everything was clean and comfortable and very homey. I’d definitely come back!

A perfect place to escape to, and even better to be so close to everything! Once we parked we could walk everywhere we needed to be. Since the place is among other homes, we felt like we got the experience of being in the city without feeling like tourists.

Cute little space in a great location. Close to restaurants/businesses/venues but also has a peaceful vibe. We went to a show at the State Theatre and it was so close and convenient! Cute little porch. Communication was specific and informative, friendly and welcoming! Thanks for providing a sweet little space for a night to the city for a rural maine crew. Great start to the New Year!
Very helpful host. Extremely responsive. Definitely will use the place again in the future
Beautiful stay, will return in summer!! Thank you

This was a wonderful location -- within walking distance of downtown attractions. Steve was extremely helpful and super responsive. I would highly recommend this listing to anyone, whether traveling solo or with family.
Fantastic little apartment, would absolutely stay again!
Great recommendations, comfy bed, and close to my favorite breakfast spots!

A very cute place that was walking distance from a bunch of great restaurants. Lots of charming and thoughtful details inside plus some much appreciated snacks! It would have been nice to get to spend more time there. I had to book last minute due to an unexpected flight delay and they were very accommodating and got back to me very quickly to assure that I had what I needed.

Lovely apartment that’s charmingly decorated and filled with nice touches for travelers (we really appreciated the snack basket and restaurant recommendations!). The location was perfect and we had no trouble finding street parking nearby. Would definitely come back again!
Absolutely wonderful location! This condo is perfectly appointed and adorably decorated! Communication with the host was clear and helpful. We hope to return!

Lovely little condo in the heart of Portland. They are not kidding when they say it is in walking distance to everything!
Small little touches made us feel like we were right at home.
We were traveling with a baby and this was the perfect size and they provided a pack-n-play.
Super clean and well stocked kitchen amenities.
Lovely place!
Awesome location! Clean and lots to enjoy!
Loved this place! Tastefully decorated with nice high ceilings and absolutely perfect location; safe and close to everything!
Great time!! Great location, porch, and the little electric fire place!
The condo was very clean upon our arrival and just as described. Very short walking distance to food, nightlife, etc. Perfect for our weekend stay and would happily stay here again!

Pros:
Good location, walkable to all main attractions of Portland
Comfortable Bed
Cool historic building
Cons:
Apartment is much smaller than pictures lead you to believe
Finishings are mix matched
Parking is challenging
Porch is adjacent to another apartment’s window and can’t be used in the evenings
Host did not respond to message about an issue
Check-in was delayed by host
Overall this was a place to stay, cleanly, and a good location. However, due to the overall experience I would not stay again or recommend.
Great stay, convenient location, we would definitely stay again!

Beautiful old neighborhood. Great location you can walk anywhere and bus lines run right down the street. Parking on street is tough to find at night but we had no problem during the day. Porch was very cute.

The place was fantastic and the location is spot on. It’s a cozy place in the arts district and walkable to everything. Host was great and allowed us to check in a little early and drop off our bags. Comfortable and spacious enough for the three of us visiting from the south and traveling through Maine. Highly recommend.
This space is beautiful and conveniently located right where you'd want to be if you were coming in from out of town. The check-in info was thorough and clear, and the home itself was clean & bright.
Great location!

This place is very conveniently located; however, there are stains in carpets and thick dust on some furniture. We also reached out to the co-host with a questions about check-in, but he never responded. We were disappointed with our stay here.

This condo is PERFECTLY located, within a short walking distance of tons of restaurants and shops. The neighborhood is beautiful to walk through, and pretty quiet despite being so close to a major thoroughfare. The only big challenge was the street parking, which was constantly full, even on the street that the host suggested. The condo itself is pretty tiny but had everything we needed. It was clean, functional, and cozy. The bed is extraordinarily creaky.
The apartment had everything we needed including some great local information from our hosts. The porch area in particular is a great touch. Many thanks, Tristan

This location is perfect for walking to old port and experiencing Portland. They had marked maps with recommendations to the waterfront. Both the host and co-host were very helpful when we had an issue, and responded very promptly. Thank you!

Super cute place, although in looking back on pictures it was smaller than it appeared. It was clean and had what we needed. Great location for walking to restaurants. The host was very nice and timely in communications.

+ Amazingly walkable and quiet side street location, ease of parking,
lovely porch, great communication and attentive host, price for the area.
- A smaller space, especially traveling with a kid, decor could use a bit of a refresh but is totally functional.
Great location, well-appointed, such a pleasant place to stay!
Amazing location for walking distance to anything in central Portland & Old Port. Tons of thoughtful & personal touches like a list of restaurant recommendations. Coffee on the porch was a delight!
Perfect location. Close to so many great places to eat. Super cute space and sitting out on the porch was delightful.

We came to Portland just for a night on our way up to Bar Harbor. This apartment was perfect, and we wish we had more time! We were a short walk to everything in town, lots of snacks and amenities on arrival to make our check in more comfortable. We would stay again on our next visit!
Great location and charming little airbnb in a nice neighbourhood !
Wonderful apartment in Portland!

Great place! Accommodating hosts as well! We were able to check in a bit early as we arrived sooner than anticipated. The walk to everything was short as described. I’d definitely stay again. Thank you!

Great place - perfect location - well-provided Kitchen - Parking is available but not always right outside the door. There is a good spot to unload and load up after your trip however. Comfortable and everything you may need to explore Portland

By far the prettiest and cleanest air bnb we have stayed in! Lovely neighborhood with beautiful homes and churches, parks, etc. around the corner. The condo itself was so cozy, everything felt brand new and as if decorated by a true professional as far as furniture, colors and comfort. Immediate response whenever we had any question, great location (we were able to find street parking right near the house however Westin parking garage right around corner), and a fun walk to the piers. What a wonderful, quaint down town with lots of little pubs, restaurants, shops, etc. and brick or cobblestone sidewalks and plazas, outdoor bars/restaurants with live music on the water. Only a 15 minute walk downtown (if you go the right way!) but fun to get lost and wander too. Even though cost for one night is on the high side, it is less expensive than any hotel in the area, with so much more to offer. Highly recommend Shalini's place!!!
Nice little apartment in Portland, a good walkable location from most sites. Ice cold AC in each room, and the porch was nice to hang out on as well.
Great location for our short stay in Portland. Shalini was communicative and easy to reach.
Well located, clean, cute. Easy check in. Parking is a challenge, but there are garages, so if you don’t want to fuss, just pay for the garage.
The condo was cute and cozy and located in a beautiful neighborhood of Portland! It was walking distance to a few great spots we checked out, like Hot Suppa and Tandem Coffee Roasters.

Shalini’s place was perfect for our family. The space was clean and comfortable. She even left a basket of some little treats for us which was such a nice touch. Her response time to our questions, when we had them, was very quick.
We were able to walk to many things. The location was great. We would stay here again, should we find ourselves in Portland again.

Shalini’s place is a great, located in a quite neighborhood about a 5-10 minute walk to downtown area with tons of restaurants and bars. The apartment itself was clean, well supplied and had everything we needed. The outdoor patio was a great touch and enjoyed sitting out there early mornings. Overall we had a great stay in Portland and would recommend this place highly.

This spot was the perfect mix of near everything and relaxed. The neighborhood is charming and quiet, but it's only a block from Congress St., which is one of the main drags through Portland. The porch and the small touches inside the unit gave it a truly homey feel. There's great restaurants nearby. Easy check-in/out. Can't say enough good things about our stay.
Great location! I'd stay again
Absolutely no complaints. Steve was great and was super sweet when there was some confusion on checkout. Lovely apartment.

Cute and cozy place for our first time in Portland! Finding street parking outside the house or nearby was easier than we expected. Lots of restaurants within walking distance. The hosts were very accommodating and always responded quickly.

This place was our favorite on our 20 day road-trip. What a beautiful ambiance Steve & Shalini provided! We walked in to some dean martin/frank sinatra playing which is my fav! Such a cute set up! Communication was great. My 1 year old just started walking and grabbed the light fixture and it broke. I told him right away and his first response was to make sure he was ok. Sometimes it can be hard to travel with kiddos but Steve made us feel confident that he understood! We also like circulating air and always need fans. He didn’t have one available but he brought us one to make sure we were comfortable! This was at like 10pm too. The location was close to everything and we so enjoyed our stay. Also do yourself a favor and go to The Holy Donut and get the cinnamon sugar blueberry donut. I literally wish I had one right now! This location was close to Old Port where it is located and easy to get to. We would stay here again if we ever returned. I will say the only downside is street parking but we were able to figure it out!
Wonderful home. Perfect location!

Our stay in Portland was great. The apartment was well-stocked with necessities and some nice surprises. It was super clean and comfortable. If you drive, be sure to figure out the parking situations. It was an unexpected expense for our vacation, but it was no fault of the owner. It’s the city.

This place was so cute, I even loved the music playing as we walked in the door. Great location, cozy, clean, and even cuter in person then in the photos. You can really tell a lot of love went into this little home. I would definitely stay here again.

Amazing location and very clean place to stay while in Portland! The host communicated greatly and had great response times. We were able to walk or Uber (very short and cheap Uber) to the main streets, and the location was safe. I would stay here again if I am ever back in Portland!

Everything was great ! Beautiful place, clean and well located :)
We had a lovely stay!

We absolutely loved our stay here! Such a great location with a quick walk to the Old Port and awesome coffee shops, restaurants, and bars nearby too! The space was so comfy, cute, and clean. We loved the sweet little porch most of all! The hosts were very responsive from booking on. We’re absolutely saving this place for the next time we stay in Portland!
Really nice place to enjoy portland
Loved our stay! Great location, very nice space that is quiet and tucked away from Congress, but easily walkable to all the restaurants and shops. Definitely will be back!

What a great little Airbnb! My family and I stayed for a week. The location was perfect and so central to everything, and there were so many great little touches (snacks and coffee, toys for the kids, etc.). Communication was quick and easy and Shalini made sure we had a great stay. We’d definitely return!

The condo is small but adequate for 2 people. It is located about a 20 minute walk from the port area and very close to restaurants and bars. Parking is bananas in Portland and there is no parking space included with this listing.
Overall it’s a nice place in a good part of town.

Amazing place!! My boyfriend and I had such a great experience at this lovely home. Everything was extremely clean and we appreciated the little touches like the music playing when we walked in and the abundance of snacks :). We really enjoyed the cute little private porch out front. Perfect location for walking into town. All around it was perfect!
I had a great stay here! The place was clean and the bed was very comfortable. The apartment was in a great location, so close to great restaurants and shops. Recommend!
In a great area, would recommend
Shalini’s place was exactly what we needed. We walked most places, it was well stocked with all the essentials.
The unit was perfect for the two of us for a weekend getaway to Portland. Cozy and in a good location to walk to all the things downtown we wanted to see.
Adorable place! Loved being there. Very quiet overnight.
Such a cute stay in a great location! When I got there I immediately checked to see if this place was available for an additional night, that’s how cute it is! Would definitely stay here again.

In real estate they say important is Location, Location, Location. Well you can't get a better spot than this AirBnB. Add quaint Maine charm and great hosts and you just can't go wrong. This small 1 bedroom apartment has everything you need. Great sleep and didn't even mind when the weather turned cold and wet - everything we needed was already provided or only a short walk away. On that note - there is no need for a car. We walked everywhere and only got an (inexpensive) Uber for travel to a neighboring town.
Shalini was incredibly prompt with any, and all communications; though we didn't need anything it was nice to know there was a person right by to address any issues that arose. Shoot, they even worked to have us picked up at the airport--how's that for service.
This was a fantastic place to stay. Highly recommend it!
Exceeded expectations, parking was not an issue just use the garage it’s super close! The house was amazing and so close to everything.
wonderful apartment in incredible location
This place is a perfect touchdown with great proximity to downtown. Would absolutely stay here again!
Parking is on the street
Very clean apartment with everything you could need for a short getaway. The location was perfect as it was walking distance from downtown and all the shops and restaurants!

Great spot in a GREAT location, close to everything. We were able to walk to Old Port and enjoy great food and drink. The apartment is super cozy and had everything that we needed for our stay. We made sure to arrive before it got too dark so we were able to easily park a couple blocks away on the street and didn't have any issues. We are already looking forward to our next trip back to Portland!!
Shalini has a great place. It is a well-designed place and very comfortable. It is close to the central part of Portland. A quick walk away from many things. Self-check-in, too.

Shalini was wonderful to communicate with! The space is in a fabulous part of town with easy walking access to some of my favorite spots in Portland. Her welcome guide was chalk-full of fantastic suggestions. I look forward to staying here again.
Amazing location, very comfortable spot! Such cute decor and setup!

Pictures misleading.
Looks modern and Fresh in photos but in reality charming but too much clutter and stuff. Books out in rain on porch. New heating remotes, back with batteries taped and falling off. Didn’t feel entirely clean. Manager person never responded to my texts and parking is a nightmare. We lucked out last minute or we would have just left.
Prepare to park 5-10 blocks away.
Nicely furnished in a great location!

Lovely little apartment in a great location (aka close to Tandem Coffee)! Check-in was easy with all the directions and pictures Shalini provided. My sisters and I were just staying the night in Portland but it served all our needs. Definitely recommend!
Great location in Portland!
It is a nice looking place and in a nice neighborhood.
Great communication and perfect space for a weekend getaway!
Such a cute space in a great location! The place was stocked with everything you need and more. They provided many great suggestions for things to do and places to eat. I would definitely stay again!
Cute place, great location. Parking is a little tough, though, so keep that in mind if you’re driving.
Her place is conveniently located to the center of the city. The space was the perfect size and the bed was very comfortable. Street parking is a challenge, but we were expecting that.
Great place to stay in for Portland! We were right at the end of the downtown strip and was able to walk the entire city in a casual stroll.
Great location, very walkable to lots of great stuff in Portland! Parking can take some patience, but otherwise a great place to stay in Portland.
I enjoyed my stay here. It's a quiet neighborhood. Walking distance to shops and restaurants.
Great location, very comfortable place, excellent communication and preparation, really enjoyed our stay. Only a little parking game issue to be aware of but worth it to be here.
Very clean and cool space with a well stocked kitchen! Convenient, quiet and quaint! Great reference information!
Perfect apartment in a great location.
Perfect place to stay in Portland - cute rustic vibe and so close to everything in walking distance to shops, restaurants, the pier, etc. The condo had everything we needed for our visit!
Great little spot! Walking distance to everything and great reviews for food in the welcome book

Loved our stay here last week - so comfy, convenient and many thoughtful amenities. Excellent information provided about the apartment and the area. Located on a quiet leafy side street just steps from town. Great porch for a quiet drink with a book before dinner. Walked to dinner at Fore St. Very comfortable bed. We will be back!
thumbs up
Super apt within walking distance to lots of great spots.

While this was a very cute and cozy stay, there were two things that were a bummer as we stayed.
1) While there is free parking. It is only from 5:01pm to 8:59am M-F. So this is a little misleading. If you’re staying multiple days, you’ll have to find a place for your car between 9 and 5 on the weekdays.
2) The bed is actually a full. Not a queen. This was the biggest let down for us as we have a queen at home and felt a little cramped.
We enjoyed our stay and the hospitality was great.
This apartment is very cozy and well appointed. A quiet neighborhood that is well located for everything in Portland!

This one-bedroom condo was perfect for a weekend in Portland, where I was attending a close friend's wedding. It was super clean, charmingly appointed, and had all the amenities that you could want. On top of that - the location was really terrific; most things I wanted to do were a short walk away. And, communication with Shalini was easy; she was very responsive whenever I reached out. Highly recommend!

What a cool and welcoming place to step into! We were greeted by the sound of Dean Martin on arrival, what a nice touch! This family are definitely seasoned AirBnB hosts, if you think you've forgotten something--they've already got it on hand for you! This family truly know how to host and I bet their family gatherings are a blast!! We were lucky enough to stay for one night on our way back from Acadia, and after days of hiking and the great outdoors, it was so lovely to sink into a big comfy bed. We found parking on the street close by, their strategic check in time made it easy to park the car for the night. The location was great for us to walk down to Old Port and back (we are NYers and used to walking but it would be an extremely short car ride too), but still quiet enough for a great night's sleep. The side porch would be lovely with a cup of something and a book mid-day. Def stay here, they will take care of you :)

Great place in a great location. With a little bit of effort you can walk everywhere, or Uber downtown for about $10. Parking wasn't too bad - found a space a few blocks over. Condo is a touch in the small side. I imagine it would be tight for anymore than 2 people. it has everything you need though. Front porch is a great spot for coffee and cocktails. I would stay here again

We enjoyed our stay in this charming house which is centrally located in the heart of Portland. Shalini, our host, provided us with lots of great tips. There's a lot of great dining options nearby and the Old Port of Portland is not far. The only minor issue is that street parking was a little difficult to find (I still managed to get parking a couple of blocks away) but thats to be expected given the central location and there's lots of public transit nearby
5/5 would stay again! Great location, great access - everything was top notch.

Shalini’s place was in a really wonderful part of Portland right by the center of the city. The place itself was very cute and very easy to get into. Shalini was very responsive and a great house! Would highly recommend.

Shalini's place is very nice and easy to find. The parking is a bit tough as there is not much street parking. It may take some patience to find the free spot. Shalini is very responsive. The place is super clean and has everything you need.

Very cute spot — has a lot of charm and character and is well maintained and very functional. Was perfect for two of us staying for the night. We were able to walk everywhere though it was a little far (20ish minutes to most places).
Great location, communicative hosts, and all in all a nice little pad in a wonderful neighborhood.

Shalani's place is exactly as advertised. We LOVED the location, which is central to everything. Their welcome packet gave lots of tips on local restaurants which was very helpful. We would absolutely stay there again!
Great apartment, comfortable & convenient, the only problem is parking, in fact parking is a problem all over town. Walking & Uber is a better choice.

Thank You Debbie and Brad for sharing your piece of heaven with us.
We were 9 days in paradise, a vacation we waited for since our honeymoon 39 years ago.
Hope to be back to Maine and 4 Loveitts in a couple years.
God Bless you both,
Nancy and John Faskel🥰
A perfect spot, we will certainly be back again!

This was the best AirBnB that my wife and I have experienced. The view was absolutely spectacular. Waking up to view the sunrise and sitting out with a cup of coffee was so peaceful. The space was perfectly clean. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a relaxing getaway.

Amazong and peaceful location.
Some great recommendations
The hot tub was well needed after our travels.
This was a rare find the view is one of a kind and spectacular! We had an amazing trip sightseeing the lighthouses and the surrounding area! Can’t wait to come back someday.
Unbelievable view. Convenient to everything you need and more!

Our stay at Debbie’s home was amazing and exceeded expectations. She has many extra personal touches throughout the Airbnb which was also one of the cleanest Airbnb’s I’ve stayed in. We absolutely loved the waterfront view, walkability, and peacefulness. Great host and home!
This place is great. The view is beautiful, the hot tub was nice and Debbie provided all the little touches to make our stay fantastic. Would definitely recommend this place to anyone and everyone.
This was an absolute fantastic stay. Debbie was a was a phenomenal host. If you love waking up to a sunrise over the ocean, Debbie‘s place will exceed your expectations. We can’t wait to come back.

This place was absolutely stunning. Even better than the pictures. The view at sunrise and at dusk is so relaxing. And the hot tub with the sound of the waves is amazing. Everything in the Airbnb is so thoughtful, nothing missed!
A few things to note (not deal breakers for us, but might be for you):
You can hear the owners above you when they are talking/walking, noise definitely travels. But the movement was so seldom it was never a problem.
The bed is very soft and kind of caves in. With two people, we kind of fell into each other while sleeping.

There is no overstating the beauty of this stay! Just wow! Debbie was so kind and left great instructions. She had a book full of maps, personalized recommendations for the area, and even left us refreshments to make us feel at home. We spent the evenings listening to the sounds of the ocean from their hot tub and woke up every morning to see the sunrise right from bed. I will DEFINITELY be staying again!
The view was amazing! Felt right at home and loved ending the day in the hot tub. Such a special spot.
A beautiful and relaxing spot! Couldn’t have asked for more. Gorgeous sunrise from bed & patio and relaxing clean hot tub.

The pictures on the listing do not do this place justice when you see the view it is absolutely incredible. Debbie was so helpful with instructions and local recommendations. I also especially liked the binder with a bunch of local spots as well as people who have stayed there with there reviews I will definitely be staying there again when coming to Portland
Second time back to Debbie’s home and hopefully will not be our last. Thanks again for a peaceful stay at your beautiful home.
An amazing view! Debbie was such a great host and it’s such a cozy spot. Hoping to return soon!!
We had an amazing stay! Debbie recommended great restaurants in the area and the views from her place were incredible. You can’t beat the views from the hot tub!
We absolutely loved the place! We enjoyed waking up to the sunrise. The location was perfect for exploring South Portland & Downtown. 10/10 recommend!
Another amazing stay! So glad we found your listing. Just like last time, every detail was perfect. Thank you again! Can’t wait to come back next year :)
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Debbie’s place! Beautiful views, thoughtful amenities, comfy bed, and lovely hot tub! Perfect place to rest and relax! Would stay again in a heartbeat!

This was one of my favorite Airbnb’s I’ve ever stayed at. The view right from your bed is absolutely breathtaking. The hot tub is overlooking the water. It’s a 3 minute walk to the most beautiful beach. But what I loved most about this place was how much I felt at home and comfortable there. I do solo travel a lot and it’s always hard to get a good night sleep, but not at Debbie’s place. It’s a little slice of heaven for sure. I will be back!!!

Our stay with Debbie was exactly what we were in need of, peaceful with lots of welcoming touches and an unbeatable view of the ocean surrounding us. We spent an equal amount of time enjoying the restaurants in South Portland and the Old Port, which is just a quick ride over the bridge.

We had an amazing stay! Debbie's place was so clean and beautiful -so many little touches that made it the perfect getaway. The hot tub with the sound of the crashing waves did not disapoint! The sunrise was breathtaking with no need to even get out of bed! Check in was so easy and Debbie was a wonderful host. We would love to come back. Scratch Bakery was a nice walk in the morning a day some of the best bagels and pastries!

This is our second stay at Debbie's place. We loved it so much we had to return. Debbie is very friendly and had so many helpful resources for things to do in the area. We love the location of this AirBnb as well as the amenities and the view. We will definitely be back and have already told all of our friends about it as well.

Debbie's place was perfect for a weekend getaway with my husband. The location and the view are absolutely breathtaking, directly overlooking the ocean and hearing the sound of the waves was perfect. We enjoyed the hot tub and we even got a little snow! The space was very clean and had all of the amenities we needed. We knew there wasn't a full kitchen which wasn't a problem as we enjoyed several local restaurants. Debbie was very welcoming and made us feel right at home from the moment we arrived. There is some noise from the living space upstairs but certainly not terrible. We very much enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend Debbie's place to anyone!

My wife and I stayed in South Portland for the weekend to celebrate her birthday. Debbie’s place was exactly what we had planned for and needed to relax and have a quiet weekend by the ocean. Space was very clean and she provided so many helpful amenities if needed. Will definitely hope to stay here again in the future

My husband and I stayed for the weekend in February. The view is absolutely beautiful and enjoying it from the hot tub is even better. It’s about a 15 minute drive into downtown Portland and scratch bakery is a 2 minute drive. Debbie was responsive, accommodating and welcoming.

Booked this for a night getaway for my girlfriends birthday - it was truly spectacular. Location, views, it has everything. Debbie was a wonderful host and so thoughtful, all the little details inside the space were very well done. Thank you Debbie!!

we were so grateful to find Debbie's place on our search for a quick overnight getaway close to home on my week off of work. I want to give more than 5 stars. What a treat ocean front, peaceful, private, hot tub and near Portland which is packed with fun things to do year round. Debbie's place was tastefully and thoughtfully decorated in ocean themes which made for a very relaxing stay. She literally thought of everything that you might have needed for your stay. We had lunch at Luke's Lobster before checking in along with a stop at Night Moves Bakery and Bug Light. We enjoyed the Hot Tub at night, watching the Fishermen come back in and then again in the morning before our check out. The sunrise views from inside the bedroom and the front porch were magical. We will be booking again.
Debbie's house is gorgeous and peaceful, and she is a very friendly and responsive host. I highly recommend staying at her place!

Debbie’s home was my first AirBnb experience, and she set the bar very high! Her home is very beautiful! The views are breathtaking and inviting. Her instructions are concise and the location was easy to find. She is communicative and has a warm personality. She goes the extra mile in ensuring her guests feel right at home, and can be seen throughout the entire space. Her list of recommendations is expansive and holds great suggestions. Overall, I had an amazing time here and would love to go back soon! Thank you Debbie!
Very much enjoyed our stay as well as the hot tub, and the stunning sunrise, the low planes flying over were very neat to watch come in also!

This was an amazing stay! I’m so happy I got to stay here for a small getaway it was exactly what I needed and the view was amazing. Debbie had so many amenities available which was so sweet. She even wrote happy birthday on the board for our birthday trip!

An Amazing spot for an overnight getaway. I wish I had spent more than 1 night. The morning sunrise over the ocean was beautiful and the views from the hot tub were just as beautiful. The suite is well set up and loved the assortment of coffee available! Debbie was also very responsive and quick to reply to any messages. I look forward to staying again!
Lovely suite with picture windows showing the ocean!
Great place. It was perfect for a quick relaxing weekend getaway. Can’t wait to come back up

Debbie and Brad’s place was wonderful. It was in a beautiful location, easy access to downtown Portland, near restaurants and coffee shops. Debbie and Brad are so helpful and friendly. The hot tub was a great touch, even in January. I will absolutely stay here again when I’m in Maine visiting family and will recommend it to other friends and family as well.
We loved our stay at Debbie's! Stunning view and such a comfortable space. We will be returning!
This is our second stay at Debbie and Brad's. It's breathtakingly beautiful, peaceful, and well-appointed. We couldn't ask for anything more!

We had a great stay with Debbie. The view was unmatched. There was so much to do in Portland and we had some great food. I definitely recommend this for couples! The place was clean and organized. Debbie left a binder of local recommendations and things to do!
Debbie is a great host with a gorgeous spot. Highly recommend!

Perfect little getaway for couples! The views were great and the room warm and cozy. The bed was super comfy, with soft sheets and plenty of pillows and extra blankets.
Watching the sunrise on a cold December morning from the warmth of bed is an experience we should all enjoy once! As well as a dip in the hot tub on a chilly winter night.
Debbie shared lots of things to do and made many restaurant recommendations. All were delicious! We highly recommend this place for a couples getaway!
What a great find. I had a nice, peaceful stay.

The most beautiful place to stay! We loved everything about this Airbnb. We kept our blinds open to watch the sunset and sunrise every day. Debbie had the place stocked with any product you could need along with snacks and drinks. She has really thought about every detail, even swimsuits for the hottub. The neighborhood was local and very safe. Debbie has recommendations of things to do and places to eat at. Must eat at Scratch bakery and get the Seasalt Bagel (Debbie recommended) we loved it so much we went every morning. When we come back to Portland we will stay here! Thank you Debbie for being the #1 Airbnb we have ever stayed at.
Amazing view! The hot tub was the perfect spot to relax.

This is an INCREDIBLE find! You are right on the ocean—The sunrises into your room. It’s the most breathtaking view you’ll ever see.
The actual space is WAAAAAY bigger than the pictures! Everything is listed and organized. Incredibly kind and precise!

This was by far our FAVORITE stay at any Airbnb! Booking with Debbie was a lovely experience. She was kind, accommodating, quickly responsive, and provided all the information we needed. She made it very easy!
The unit and the grounds were everything we hoped they would be. Just perfect. We wanted to be right on the water with a view of the sunset and moonlight.We were wowed! The unit is lovely with its coastal colors, Maine accents, and it’s views. It is true to Maine in its simple elegance. We watched sunrise and the boats that come in and out of the bay. We explored local lighthouses and flew kites on Crescent Beach. We experienced local bakeries and dinner at Fore Street Grill; so worth a visit! Beyond all of this are the little touches that make a BIG difference. The bathroom is fully stocked with just about anything you may have forgotten to pack. She provides recommendations for food and recreation & extra swimsuits, robes, local craft beer sampler. Amazing! A++++ stay TY Debbie
She thinks of every detail!!! It was the most beautiful view and place to relax. Also, coming from DC, the restaurant she recommended can compete with any here. We are planning on going back.

This was a return visit for my husband and I. We had a wonderful time with great accommodations. You can not beat the view and it is in a nice quiet neighborhood. Debbie is very responsive if you need anything. The suite is set up very nicely with just about anything you might need so we have not had a rely on Debbie for any additional needs. A favorite spot for us in the Portland area.
5 stars all around. The best Airbnb experience ever. Highly recommend
This was the best air b n b we have ever stayed and the sunrise view can’t be beat. Debbie is an amazing host.
Such a beautiful home! Staying here was by far the best part of our vacation. Debbie thought of every detail to ensure we had a good trip :)

Debbie’s place is remarkable! The view is spectacular and beyond peaceful. Be sure to sleep with the shades up to see the beautiful sunrise! Debbie provided a list of recommendations and clear instructions on all the amenities. It is obvious the amount of effort and love they put into this place and it doesn’t go unnoticed! Thanks for having us!
It was just amazing, the views are ridiculous. And they have everything you could want, as well as an amazing binder of anything to do/eat in Portland

This place is so beautiful! Terrific hosts! Gorgeous view! Lots of things to do in Portland but the location feels so small town. A nearby beach and 2 lighthouses within a short walking distance. We tend to go to different places on vacation but we might have to break our "new places only" rule and return to Brad and Debbie's in Portland.

We had a great weekend at Debbie’s place. There was a ton to do, lots within walking distance. The binder Debbie has created for her guests was very helpful! We had a fantastic dinner at David’s 388 and enjoyed a local brewery and bakery.
The space was clean and comfortable. The views were incredible and the sounds of the waves were mesmerizing.

We loved the place! Great location right on the water. Many things to do within walking distance from the Airbnb- lighthouses, parks, Willard Beach, bakeries, restaurants, and shops. Comfy bed. Debbie was great with giving suggestions on places to eat. We loved watching the cruise ships, sailboats, and lobster boats right outside our window. The hot tub was perfect to use at the end of the day after all the walking and sightseeing we did in South Portland and Portland. We are definitely planning to come back the next time we visit Maine.

We had an incredible stay. Everything was absolutely stunning and very peaceful. Debbie is a wonderful host and went above and beyond with recommendations. She truly thought of everything. Watching the boats go by while relaxing in the hot tub was the best. We highly recommend Debbie and Brad’s place. Hope to come back again!

Debbie’s place was just perfect for a quiet weekend away! Listening to the ocean waves crashing was so relaxing and we were able to see a couple of cruise ships come by which was also cool. The rental is spotless and quaint. Will definitely stay here again
Debbie's house, porches and grounds were beautiful! The views were exquisite! We couldn't have been more pleased with our stay.
Beautiful peaceful getaway conveniently located near all the places to see! Wonderful and welcoming host! I’ll cherish the memories of sunrise and sunset on the water with my husband and newborn 💙

Debbie’s place is one of a kind and truly beautiful. The views are incredible. My husband and I enjoyed every second at their place. Debbie was very kind and easy to communicate with. We would absolutely stay here again!

Our trip was a bit stressful but when we arrived and I saw the views, all that melted away. Debbie’s place is extraordinary - the views on the outside only surpassed by the beauty of the inside space. So many windows overlooking the bay, beautiful light and exquisite decor and colors inside. I am an artist and photographer and I wanted to just live here, it was so nice. Everything was clean, organized, well thought out - perfect. The highlight of our Maine trip was staying here, taking a two hour sail with Portland Schooner and the hot tub at night at the end of each day. I highly recommend this stay as a getaway and home base for Portland.
Our favorite spot on our trip. Could not beat the views and sound of the waves. 100% would recommend for anyone needed a peaceful stay.

The location has a beautiful view and is a quick and easy drive to all the local spots! Debbie was a great host and had lots of recommendations in a binder with things to do. We forgot swim suits for the hot tub but she had back-up suits in the room which was great! We loved our stay!
This is the most amazing Airbnb! The views are breathtaking, and the room is so cozy! Hosts are fabulous and so thoughtful. We cannot wait to come back!

I absolutely Love this Airbnb and it was so great to stay here again! The views of Casco Bay and the cruise ships saiing by are amazing! Debbie and Brad are always so hospitable and they always make you feel so welcome....it is so peaceful and relaxing to sit out on the newly renovated porch and look out at the beautiful views of Casco Bay, the large cruise ships, tour boats, sail boats and schooners sailing by...the view of the sunrise is breathtaking! The bedroom is very comfortable and the sun shines right into the bedroom as it rises! The hot tub is so relaxing with the beautiful views of Casco Bay right in front of you! The landscaping with the flower garden is absolutely beautiful...thank you so much again Debbie and Brad for always making me feel so welcome and for giving me the opportunity to stay in your beautiful Airbnb!
Michael

Simply put, this was hands down the best Airbnb I’ve ever stayed at. Debbie and Brad clearly put an immense amount of work into making their guests’ stay special. Most of the other reviews for this Airbnb accurately highlight most of the amenities. You won’t regret staying here. It truly is a hidden gem.

Debbie's place has the perfect ocean view for a romantic getaway! We had ample privacy despite the hosts living in the house. We loved hearing the ocean crash outside the window, watching the sun rise & the birds--we even saw a cardinal couple our last morning. The hot tub was great & the Keurig and mini fridge was appreciated. This was the first Airbnb I've ever stayed at without a microwave, but the listing made that clear!
Absolutely would love to have the chance to stay here again! It was so peaceful and inviting!

The place was a once-in-a-lifetime type of venue! Really, it was a spectacular location - so peaceful and original! We absolutely loved it!! It will probs be our only time in Maine so we felt lucky it was here!

With such a breathtaking property and a view that really could never get old, who's thinking about the small details?
Debbie and Brad, that's who!
The thoughtfulness they put into this property blew us away and, on several occasions, saved us time and money. Their restaurant and activity recommendations made for a great trip as well. One of the best—if not the best—airbnbs we’ve stayed at! Highly recommend. Thank you!!
Debbie’s home has the most amazing view! It is also nestled in a cute neighborhood near the beach and lots of other fun attractions. We had such a great time!

This was our third year in a row staying here and we have zero regrets. Debbie is very helpful and courteous and we feel right at home every time. The only debate with our vacation was whether or not to add an extra night and we are so glad we did. The room is immaculate and everything you need is thoughtfully placed in the medicine cabinet. The view is astounding, there is nothing like sitting on the patio watching the sailboats go by, the bay is beautiful. We have never needed anything but Debbie is super communicative and always in touch to make sure everything is fine. Ubers are also pretty accessible so downtown is an easy drive in if you want to grab dinner. South Portland also has it’s own establishments and some are within walking distance. Willard Beach is a quick walk through the neighborhood, a very beautiful area. The hot tub is fantastic to relax in at nighttime. We hope to be back one day, this place has set us off on a lifelong journey of traveling. Thank you very much!
Debbie’s place is magical! Such a fantastic place to relax and enjoy the views during our Portland trip. Such a joy to stay here!

Debbie's place is just stunning! The views are incredible, and she has a great location right on the Bay. The location is fabulous with easy access to Portland and southern Maine. We had a great time just relaxing on the porch and enjoying the hot tub. We wished we could stay forever!

Best Airbnb we’ve ever stayed in. So clean, comfortable bed, well stocked with everything we could have possibly needed, and the view was spectacular!! Very private and peaceful location. We wanted to move in and never leave!! Great hosts that were available if we needed them, but we didn’t because the place was perfect!! Can’t wait to go back sometime soon!

Absolutely beautiful and exactly like the pictures. Very comfortable bed. Breathtaking views. Nice outdoor space for reading or just relaxing as you listen to the waves hit the rocky shore below. Hope to return again next year.

Our stay was absolutely amazing breathtaking views of the water, and even though it was in a neighborhood you felt secluded and it’s all very private. Debbie was very responsive to text messages directions were precise. We absolutely loved our stay.
Wonderful place to stay! So peaceful and comfortable.

The most beautiful setting with stunning views relaxing on the porch! Debbie's place exceeded our expectations with its beauty. She has thought of everything as a host. Personally I love a hot tub and expected to be in it about four times in our two night stay. It is a great hot tub, but we so thoroughly enjoyed just sitting in the comfortable seating on the porch and patio that we used it only once. Debbie has decorated beautifully inside and out. This place was money well spent. You will not be disappointed ... except when it's time to check out!

We had a great stay at Debbie’s! It was a beautiful location that was quiet and peaceful. The place was very clean and well taken care of. You can tell a lot of thought was put into every little detail. We will most definitely be back!

All I can say is book it now, it is worth every penny. The view is spectacular, the hot tub overlooking the ocean, the sunrises it is truly a piece of heaven. I have traveled all over the world and seen some beautiful places and as far as Airbnb‘s are concerned this is in my top three Debbie was a wonderful host, offering any recommendations for local restaurants and things to do you were just a short Uber ride to downtown Portland which has so much to offer. Thank you Debbie for a wonderful stay. We will see you soon.!!
Absolutely gorgeous view!! You couldn’t find a better spot than this. Debbie was very communicative and helpful. We’d love to come back!

What a treasure! With only a few days in Portland, this offered a beautiful scenic view, easy walk to a beach, and restful atmosphere. 15-20 min and affordable to Uber, and even within distance for Uber eats and other delivery services. The hosts are delightful! Will definitely return and stay here!
Beautiful location with incredible views. The hosts were very helpful and friendly, would definitely stay again next time we are in Portland!

The view was exactly as pictured, super close to a beach, Portland Head Light and a short drive to Portland/Old Port. We enjoyed walking around their neighborhood and to Scratch Bakery. The hot tub was also very clean and so relaxing with an amazing view. The room was a bit more noisy than expected with foot traffic and host activity overhead, but would still recommend. They offered nice touches and amenities, too. We felt welcomed and enjoyed the beautiful location.

Everything was truly perfect. A hot tub retreat between a full day in Portland and going out to dinner cannot be described. The commute to downtown Portland was a few minutes AND we were glad to retreat back to this quiet, beautiful, well appointed home away from home. Whatever we might have forgotten or needed was right there! Absolute value for the price .

Deborah and Brad were great hosts. Their place has an unbeatable view of the water and they provided tons of great recommendations of things to do. It was very nice to be able to get out of the city to relax after a day of activities. Highly recommended.
The place was absolutely beautiful! The accommodations were very comfortable and the place was clean and had everything. The views from the backyard were beautiful and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay!
This was a clean beautiful place in an amazing location
Magnificent water views await you in South Portland. Very private, ultra clean and comfortable space. Highly recommended.

Debbie was a fantastic host and her home was more beautiful than the photos! Location is amazing and oh so peaceful! We thoroughly enjoyed watching the boats go by and just relaxing on the lovely porch! The room and extra touches were perfect! I would give it a 10 score if I could!
Wonderful experience, planning a return trip as soon as we can.

Debbie and Brad were tremendous hosts and the accomodations were outstanding. Everything was spotless and exceeded expectations. Especially, the picturesque setting. The photos on the listing are very good, but the actual view is even better! Looking forward to our next visit.
Debbie's place is exactly as described, a beautiful, calm place to relax. The space included all amenities listed, and she went above and beyond, making us feel welcome. We will definitely be back!

What an amazing property! Everything about our weekend stay was stellar. Debbie and her husband were extremely friendly and responsive in our communications with them. The setting itself is unbelievably beautiful, right on the water with an amazing view of the sunrise in the mornings. The unit itself was exactly as advertised - very comfortable, clean, bright, airy, and welcoming. Debbie left an excellent list of recommendations of things to do and local restaurants, bakeries and coffee shops. And to top it off, the outdoor hot tub was an added treat! Overall, a fantastic property.

By far the best airbnb experience I’ve had. My wife and I stayed for our honeymoon, and everything about the place was perfect. They had everything you could possibly want for us. And the view and location were absolutely perfect. 10/10 experience and can’t recommend enough.

The location can't be beat. I mean truly you are right on top of the ocean and the view and sounds of the ocean and birds are unmatched. Debbie thought of everything and more. The whole experience was beyond our expectations.
Very private and a great neighborhood to walk around in with a short walk to the beach. Plenty of things to do nearby that were a short drive. Overall, very pleased with the place.
Really loved Debbie's place, you simply cannot beat watching the sun rise over the Atlantic from a hot tub. Overall a wonderful experience, we hope to return! Thanks Debbie!

The minute I crossed the threshold
I knew I made an amazing choice.
Debbie had a nice message on the note board. She thought of everything... complimentary local beer & wine. Coffee & Tea.
Books & Games A large map of
Maine. Listening to the wavy & the view was 10. She thought of everything and more! I was honored to stay at this amazing home!! Thank you & I hope to return soon with my Hubby.

This was THE perfect romantic getaway for my husband and I. We got to try some awesome Portland restaurants and then come back and soak in the tub while listening to the waves. The unit has everything one might need and we felt very welcomed and well taken care of by Debbie. If the chance ever arises, I’d come back in a heartbeat.

Wonderful spot! The pictures don’t do it justice. Breathtaking views. The hot tub was so relaxing. It was amazing to wake up to such a beautiful sunrise.
Thank you!

I've never stayed at a home rental through Airbnb. Although I was a little apprehensive, Debbie helped ease my concerns. She walked me through the process and was extremely helpful.
The room and her home were very clean and comfy. The view was incredible while soaking in the hot tub. Debbie recommended a lovely restaurant for dinner which was phenomenal.
I feel very fortunate to have found "paradise". Memories to last a lifetime!

If I could give this ABB ten stars I would! Fantastic place! Amazing location! Great hosts! Clean, provides everything you need in the room and more, just spectacular! And the sunrise view from your bedroom. Simply breathtaking! Thank you so much Debbie for a amazing weekend! My only wish is that we stayed longer! Next time :). We truly appreciate everything. Hope Florida was fun!
The views do not disappoint! I will absolutely be back!
Super clean, fantastic sunrise over the ocean, fun to be in the hot tub and watch the boats on the water, great place to relax and leave the cares of life. Great hosts.
Debbie is a fantastic host and very generous sharing such a beautiful place! This place is such a convenient amazing getaway!
Amazing little location with a great view!

Debbie’s place was absolutely wonderful and has one of the best sunrise views of any Airbnb I’ve ever seen! We were only in town for one night, but wish we could have stayed longer and would definitely love stay at Debbie’s place again next time we’re in Portland. It was exactly as described, very clean and comfortable, very easy to find and check in/out of, and had wonderful personal touches that we really appreciated like the snacks, coffee/tea, and local beer! Despite it being chilly we loved being able to use the hot tub and the view of the stars was wonderful! Even better though was the sunrise. Seriously. Holy moly if you stay here it is absolutely worth it to set an alarm for the sunrise and watch it from bed. Can only imagine how magical this place would be in the summer months too! Debbie was great to communicate with, and provided lots of great local recommendations as well.
Debbie was an amazing host and very responsive if we had any questions! We will definitely be back for another visit! Absolutely beautiful views!

This was such a breathtaking getaway. You are right on the water with views of the little islands, boats going by, and the sunrise!! The hot tub was so relaxing and also right on the water. Inside, the home is clean, tastefully decorated, and has so many little touches to supply you with anything you might need. Debbie has created a big informational binder that gives you a lot of tips and suggestions for local places to visit. We cannot wait to go back and stay there again!
Debbie was an incredible host with a beautiful home! The perfect one-night peaceful getaway. Nothing like relaxing in the hot tub listening to the sound of the waves. Highly recommend!

This spot is amazing, the views are outstanding, location is clean, quiet and private, everything was fantastic! We had everything we needed and then some. Debbie puts a lot of thought into making sure her guests feel welcomed and comfortable and it was much appreciated.
This Airbnb is an absolute dream! Beautiful space and location with so many thoughtful touches. Thanks for such an incredible stay!
A lovely place to stay, with an easy host. We had a great time in south Portland!
Wonderful bay views with lots of ship activity. Multiple exciting attractions near by.

Peace by the sea… is exactly what you’ll find here. The sunrise through the windows was magical! Everything was immaculate and there’s something about looking out at the ocean while soaking in a hot tub that just can’t be beat. Book this spot!

Debbie and Brad were wonderful and their home is beautiful. The view and the sunrise was unreal. Their home was spotless, comfortable and the neighborhood was in a great location. Walking distance to bakeries, a few restaurants and a quick drive to the main Portland area. The hot tub with the sounds of the ocean was so relaxing! We can’t wait to visit again!
This is one heck of a find. We loved every bit of our stay here. You cannot beat the view while relaxing in the hot tub. Probably one of the best experiences in an AirBnB that I’ve ever had.

Second time visiting Debbie’s little home away from home. Enjoyed the hot tub with gorgeous maine covered snow and ocean to look out on. So close to Portland so of course we had to hit some breweries too. Easy checkin and amazing stay! 10 stars!
This unit was exactly what I wanted. Quiet, beautiful surroundings, and close enough to down town Portland. Debbie was an incredibly friendly host. I would love to stay here again!
Such a stunning place to spend my 50th birthday with my husband! The ocean, the hot tub, and oh, that sunrise! Magnificent!!
great stay! debbie was the perfect host! enjoyed the place. easy uber to town!
Beautiful location, we could hear the sound of waves for our room, and had all we needed for a the 2 days we were there. Definitely hope to come back to Debbies place!

Fantastic stay. Beautiful surroundings and extremely clean accommodations. Little details to make it extra special. Loved the hot tub as well! It was perfect on a brisk night!
Will definitely visit again!

I found Debbie's place on a whim and it was the PERFECT house to celebrate my 2nd anniversary with my husband. The location was quiet, and SO peaceful with the view of the ocean right from the house, and waking up to the sunrise coming in through the bedroom was luxurious. This was such a romantic getaway. The hot tub was also a treat on a very cold winter night - thank you again to Debbie for hosting us. Your hospitality and the location is a dream, and we would go back in a heartbeat!
Loved staying here. Pictures don’t do it justice! The home and views are amazing. I’m definitely booking this place whenever I go to Portland !

Debbie and Brad are incredible hosts. The property is absolutely beautiful. You can't help but take in the view and relax!
The sunrise every morning was spectacular as well as the moon reflecting on the water.
We are already planning a return trip.
Caron & Mary
A stunning place. Maybe my favorite place I have ever stayed from a location perspective with Airbnb. Breathtaking view from the porch. Will come back!

From the moment I arrived I felt welcome! The property and accommodations were even better than the pictures. Everything was tidy and clean and the hosts were helpful and informative- absolutely no issues! Bed was incredibly comfortable, linens were crisp, great WiFi connection, nothing was missed! The view was absolutely fantastic, especially waking up to the sunrise. There were so many thoughtful touches it is impossible to list them all, including helpful instructions (with pictures) and an incredibly informative welcome book. The space was roomy and well appointed but my favorite spot of all was the hot tub! I went in 5 times over my 2 night stay - the view of the ocean and sound of the waves crashing was my happy place. Quick walk to a local beach, short drive (it was too cold to walk) to yummy restaurants, all in all a fabulous stay!
Wonderful hosts and location. Perfect for a night away.
Beautiful place and great location.

Debbie’s place was Jaw-dropping. What an escape! My fiancé and I had a super relaxing time between the amazing hot tub, star gazing, and panoramic views of the ocean. We even had a chance to see the local beach and some light houses. The guest suite itself was also bigger than it looks and had everything you need to feel super cozy. The small extras like wine and local beer in the fridge and snacks was a very thoughtful touch. I’d stay here again in a heartbeat. This was an incredible little hidden gem of an AirBnb! Highly recommend.
