My partner and I had an amazing stay - so many special little touches that made us feel right at home. We visited from NYC and we greatly appreciated how quiet and peaceful the space was. Highly, highly recommend this special spot.

Once again, a lovely stay- all too brief!
The sunset lovely. The moonrise striking.
It was a pleasure to meet and talk with Debbie, one of the owners.
So many caring touches to make any stay welcoming and comfy.
Truly gracious host!
We hope to return!
The view was incredible! Debbie has thought of everything and added so many nice touches. Would highly recommend!

What a lovely- truly wonderful place. There is love and care put into the space and… a glorious view and beautiful and restful place - a great neighborhood too. One of the owners came out to meet us on our last evening. Debbie is a gracious and kind host.
Beautiful view sunrise I'm the room , ocean from your bed

Debbie's place is a little slice of heaven right on the ocean. The view from the bedroom is absolutely incredible. We were able to sip coffee and watch the sunrise right from our bed. Stunning!
She has thought of every single detail and nothing is lacking. I cannot recommend her place enough. Treat yourself!

Debbie's house is incredible. The ocean view is awesome and watching the sunrise from bed is fantastic. Highly recommend. Debbie went above and beyond to make sure you're comfortable and you have everything you need. Also, the neighborhood is nice with great food options.
Such an amazing stay! The view was unbelievable. Debbie put so much thought into every detail and you can tell she really cares about her guests! Would definitely recommend!
Everything was great.
Absolutely amazing, one of the best places we have stayed in

Debbie and Brad were amazing host and very thoughtful. The view from the house was stunning I couldn’t believe how beautiful it was there. They helped guide us with leaving maps for us to learn our way around. The beach is only within walking distance which is a perfect walk to explore the neighborhood. Downtown Portland is only about 13 minute drive and the lighthouses are only a few minutes away.

You will wake-up to dramatic sunrises in this cozy space. Spotless, comfortable and everything you need for a peaceful and beautiful stay in South Portland. Debbie is a welcoming, informative host who takes pride in making you feel right at home. Everything we saw, ate and drank was a yes!! We even cold plunged at Willard Beach! Stay here!

You MUST experience the magic of this unbelievably beautiful place. Debbie is an incredibly detail oriented host with many helpful recourses and thoughtful amenities. We felt very well taken care of! The view from the backyard is worth the stay alone but throw in the hot tub, short walk to the beach/lighthouse, and short drive to the downtown area. I would choose this place 100x over!!

I can absolutely say that Debbie’s home was absolutely amazing! The views were amazing! The room was great and the bathroom was spotless. we were a quick 10-12 minute Uber ride from downtown Portland. The hot tub was also great and the views were amazing. Also this location was near all the light houses in south Portland. We’re already planning to comeback! Thank you Debbie!

Beautiful location with the most thoughtful and accommodating hosts. Debbie has taken time and great care to make her space warm and welcoming to her guests. Would most definitely rent this space again and recommend it to anyone traveling to the area.
Coming in after dark and finding a cold beer in the fridge made my husbands’ day. Watching the sun rise over the ocean with hot Keurig coffee in bed was also a treat.
Debbie’s place is fantastic. My wife and I highly recommend staying here and would absolutely do so again.
This is a must stay if you’re visiting Portland! Quick and easy drive into downtown Portland. The views and comfort of this stay are unmatched!
Everything was exceptional: the view, the setting, location, and the small details including a local beer chilled the refrigerator.

This home is nothing short of fabulous! Perfect for a getaway and the ultimate relaxation! Just a short drive from downtown, but I promise you that you won’t even want to leave! Debbie is an amazing host who is so incredibly thoughtful and really makes you feel special when you walk through the door.

Hi Debbie and Brad! I want to thank you both so much for your hospitality and giving me the opportunity to stay at your beautiful Airbnb once again! 🙂 This is my third time staying there and I absolutely loved everything as always! I loved your greeting on the white board as I walked in the first day. Everything is so clean and the the bed is so comfortable to sleep in. The large windows in the bedroom overlooking Casco Bay is fantastic. The views of Casco Bay, the sunrises, the full moon, the ships that sail by (especially the large cruise ships!) are amazing! It is so peaceful and relaxing to sit out on your beautiful porch and take it all in. I also loved relaxing in the hottub. It is in a perfect spot to relax and look out at the ocean. Your landscaping is so beautiful with all of the colorful plants and flowers. Thanks so much again to you both and I am looking forward to my next visit!
~ Michael

Debbie and Brad's place is absolutely beautiful, and perhaps the best AirBnb in Portland. Checking in and out were a breeze. The welcome board, snacks, and refreshments were a lovely touch. The views from the room, deck, and hot tub are stunning. What a perfect spot to catch the sunrise- we're so happy we had a clear morning during our stay! The hot tub instructions were very clear and it only takes about 45 seconds to read and follow- perfect for relaxing both before and after dinner. The only sounds we heard during our stay was that of the ocean waves crashing against the shore and rock cliffs, the occasional birds, and the breeze- all of the sounds you'd hope to hear during a vacation (we may have heard the cats wrestling at one point, which just made us laugh for a second). Having the option of either having our windows open or turning on the air conditioning was great. They have room in their driveway for a rental vehicle, and getting in and out when needed was easy. And, their home is only a 12 minute drive to downtown.
We caught Brad at the perfect time as we were about to head out to explore for the day, and he made some great recommendations, our favorite being Scarborough Beach. We visited a few other beaches, some of which were free and some which you pay. Scarborough was $10 for each person, but well worth it for how large and sandy it is. You can really spread out away from other people there and feel like you are the only ones there.
I could go on about all of the reasons their place is so perfect, but just read the other reviews here and look at the pictures if you need any more convincing. This is one of those gems that we want everyone to know about but also want to keep secret to raise our chances of it being available the next time we adventure to Maine.
Thanks so much once again, Debbie and Brad!
-Greg & Alexandra
Very clean very private awesome view of the ocean hot tub was very nice and clean everything inside was perfect such a nice place! Highly recommend!

The apartment is beautifully furnished and spotlessly clean. The views from the window and porch, especially of the morning sunrise, are spectacular. We didn’t venture into the hot tub, but perhaps on our next trip….

This spot is probably my favorite Airbnb we’ve ever stayed in. The view of the bay, the sound of the waves hitting the rocks, the sunrise… and the ability to enjoy those views from the bedroom, the porch, and the hot tub… it’s just a perfect place. Highly recommended. And Debbie was a great host, she welcomed us and introduced herself upon arrival, but aside from that we felt like we were in a secluded paradise.
While it’s just a short drive to the more bustling spots in Portland, there are also some great local spots in South Portland, some even in walking distance.

Debbie was an excellent host. The listing was exactly as promised. She truly thought of everything, including a personal welcome note, guidebooks, beer and wine, coffee, tea, water, extra toiletries. There were even umbrellas and ponchos and bathrobes. We have stayed at 5 star hotels that didn't have this many amenities. One thing we overlooked was that there is no TV, which isn't a huge deal unless you're like us and watch TV to fall asleep. Just make sure to bring your tablet or other streaming device so you can watch via the wifi connection.
We would gladly stay again!

The perfect spot for peace & quiet but nearby enough to the hustle & bustle! The description & photos are accurate. So beautiful. Debbie was an excellent host and checked in to make sure things were going well. There were nice little touches to make us feel welcome. Would definitely stay here again!!
It was great and perfect location and host!

Everything about this place was just remarkable!!! The ocean view is breathtaking and even better in person than it appears in the photos. We also loved the area of South Portland. It is so close to Portland and the popular Old Port but feels slightly more secluded and provides a true local experience. Several bakeries and restaurants are within walking distance as well as a beach and a few lighthouses which we thoroughly enjoyed. Truly one of the best airbnbs I have had the opportunity to stay in and I hope to come back as soon as possible! If you are debating booking Debbie and Brad’s stay - do not hesitate! You won’t regret it!
This property is beautiful. The views, the space and the design. I wish I could bottle it up and bring it home. We can’t wait to go back!
Breathtakingly beautiful! Debbie and Brad are perfect hosts.

I am a AirBnB host (a very picky one too) this is the BEST AirBnB we have EVER stayed at !!! Everything is better in person …. The AirBnB , the view , Debbie !!!!! We walked to Scratch bakery and had lunch and then walked on the beach to the Spring Point Ledge lighthouse ….you must take the $5 tour !!!!
We did not want to leave !!!! 1000% book this place …. It will be the highlight of your trip !!!
Beautiful view and a reason alone to stay here. We were close to everything in South Portland and downtown Portland. I wish we could have stayed longer. Highly recommended for spectacular views.

We absolutely love Debbie’s place. This was our second time at her Airbnb and we love it! She is so accommodating, check in is super easy, and lets just talk about the view and the garden. A++ . Let’s just say I had a tear this morning when we had to leave. Thank you for an incredible stay!

This was the perfect place to unwind and relax after spending a few days hiking in Baxter. The property is absolutely beautiful with amazing views and personal touches to make your stay a memorable one. The location was perfect - solitude, yet only a short drive to anything you would want to explore in the Portland area. Highly recommend to anyone visiting the area!

If you’re reading this — just book it!! This is one of the best airbnbs we’ve ever stayed — the view! Pictures do not do it justice — breathtaking. Quaint apartment with thoughtful touches & all the comforts (extra swim suits if you forgot yours!) Debbie is a fantastic host, you will not be disappointed!

Stayed here for a couples visit to Portland. The view is amazing. Host has everything well planned and communicated. Ice cream, donut shop and good eats walking distance. Walkable beach is OK. We found ourselves spending most of our time here: relaxing, reading, and hot tubbing. Highly recommend for the amazing scenery of waking up to an amazing sunset! Thanks again!

This property is amazing! The views are unbeatable and it’s in the perfect location. We stayed for 5 nights and it served as the central location to everything we wanted to see and do. Looking out to the water every morning and evening was such a meditative way to start and finish every day.

This is simply the most beautiful AirBnB we have ever stayed at. The photos in the source listing give only a hint at the views. Whether from the comfort of the bed or sitting out on the porch one is surrounded by views of the water, islands and boats making there way back and forth. Debbie is a gracious host and the guest suite itself is nicely decorated and very comfortable.

Debbie is a terrific host, everything was perfect. This is a fantastic place for a couple looking to get away - quiet, scenic, no television, just boats and beautiful oceanfront views - a great place to relax and enjoy some time away from the usual stressors and daily news. Wonderful!

Wonderful location with spectacular view of the water. Spacious bedroom with lots of natural light, full size bathroom, and an entry area with a mini-fridge and coffee. Many wonderful local food and small markets close by. Quick walk to a small local beach and short drive to several lighthouses including Portland Head. Also easy 15 minute drive to South Portland Commercial street area with lots of shops and restaurants. Our Host was very friendly and checked-in routinely via text to make sure we had everything we needed and were comfortable. Overall a really wonderful experience!

Debbie is the sweetest host ever! She made it the perfect stay for our honeymoon! The location was perfect to walk to lots of things and go to Down town Portland. She even gave us a ride to the train station when we couldn’t get an Uber! She’s very thoughtful and this was the perfect stay.

Fantastic is the only word for this location. Host Debbie and Brad are exceptional. Views are something you will not want to leave. Great home base for visiting Portland and South Portland yet giving you privacy and solitude. This is a 100% correct move for selecting a Airbnb.

It was amazing to be able to return to this paradise. We stayed last year and we were compelled to come back. Everything is taken care of for you and Debbie and Brad could not be nicer people. Brad is great for conversation and his parting gift of Bissell Brothers beer did not go unappreciated! Anyone should be lucky to stay here, the views are unmatched, the hosts are incredibly thoughtful, you don’t want to leave. We hope to be back!
Amazing views! Very relaxing and quiet. The sunrise from the bedroom is a must! Short commute to downtown.
They thought of everything which made our stay very special. If you forgot it she had it. Very relaxing few days.
Fantastic property and accommodation with a spectacular view located very close to Portland! We highly recommend it to anyone staying in South Portland!
Photos don't do this place justice. If you're lucky enough to find it bookable, just do it.

Sublime!!! Definitely one of the most beautiful places we have stayed. Everything was perfect…gorgeous home and property, tastefully decorated and the views are stunning! Watching the sunrise from our bed was heavenly. There is so much to do and see here. Our hosts were the best!! Only regret that we didn’t stay longer!!
Incredible hosts, beautiful views, great location! Highly recommend staying here!

Along with everyone else's reviews, Debbie’s house was absolutely the best Airbnb we have stayed at. We did not want to leave! From the stunning views, the spotless house, the little notes and tips and recommendations provided for first time visitors, the list goes on. Everything exceeded our expectations, you have to stay here if you are planning a trip to Portland, Maine!

Debbie and Brads home is beautiful as shown in the pictures. The location is breathtaking and so relaxing. The yard is beautifully landscaped and adds to the beauty of the home. The space is very welcoming and the bed was so comfortable. Debbie and Brad were both available to help with any questions we had. The home is within walking distance of Willard beach and a short drive to downtown Portland, where there are a lot of shops and restaurants. I highly recommend staying at this home. It is in a quiet neighborhood yet close enough to a lot of things to do. You won’t be disappointed.

Such an incredible stay Debbie and her husband were beyond amazing hosts! The room was spotless and the view was incredible especially in the morning watching the sunrise. I would highly recommend staying here if you get the chance!
This place is AMAZING….the location, views, sounds, and hosts! My only wish was for a longer stay.
This place is just heaven!! By far the best Airbnb I have ever stayed at. We are already planning our trip back!!

Great place to stay with spectacular views! So many things to do and see! It was one of the cleanest Airbnb's I have ever stayed at. Debbie welcomed us with a very sweet note on the bulletin board and complementary beer and wine. We couldn't have asked for a better place!!

Perfect weekend getaway to Portland- Absolutely cannot beat the stunning view of the bay! Debbies place was very clean and full of small amenities to make our stay comfortable and feel like home. Only a short 15 minute ride into downtown Portland. Easy to walk to local shops and see the local sights, including lighthouses, parks and beaches. Loved our stay!
What a view! The property is stunning and so relaxing. We had everything we needed on site and it was easy enough to drive over to downtown Portland.

Debbie's place is wonderful. So clean, nicely decorated, and the personal touches to ensure their guests are comfortable are above and beyond any Air B&B I have ever stayed in (which is many!). The views are stunning and even better taken in from the hot tub or deck for the sunrise or sunset. I will definitely be back for a visit!

Absolutely wonderful view in a cozy spacious room. You get way more then what you’re paying for at this Airbnb. I was pleasantly shocked by how much Debbie provided during our stay and how prepared the room was for our arrival.
Great location and amazing view . Perfect little getaway to relax for 1-2 people .

We loved our stay here! The views were absolutely stunning and it was only a short drive to downtown. We really enjoyed the use of the hot tub as well! Debbie was an incredible host and we hope to visit again soon!

Debbie's place is magical. The views are absolutely second to none, and that hot tub is the perfect place to spend time! Debbie had a sampling of local beer & wine in the fridge when we arrived, which was really a nice touch. She also had everything very well labeled for ease of use around the suite. One thing to note is that there is not a kitchen, only a mini fridge, so that's definitely important to take into consideration when booking. There's also not a TV, but I can't imagine why you'd want one with Debbie's location! Highly recommend.

Debbie's space was so perfect for our 2 night get a way. It was so cute, comfy and clean. The view is amazing! Even though it was cloudy while we were there we woke to a beautiful sunrise right out our window. The hot tub with a view of the ocean was awesome after a day of walking around Portland. It is a short drive to Old Port and all kinds of restaurants, which Debbie has a book of menus and recommended restaurants etc. We had a nice dinner at Scales if you like seafood. Becky's dinner had a great breakfast with homemade food. There were a couple places we didnt get to try because they were closed, but maybe next time. Willard Beach is a nice beach to walk around and there is an old fort and lighthouse. Debbie & her husband were readily available if we needed anything but also gave us our privacy. We hope to come back and stay again. you won't be disappointed if you stay here!

Debbie's studio has a fantastic bay view, great accommodations and is well appointed. The hot tub and gardens brings a wonderful sense of peace and quiet but is still close enough to downtown Portland to enjoy and explore the city. We would highly recommend Debbie's place to any traveler who is looking for both the excitement of the city and the peace and quiet of a beach side home.

This was a wonderful place to stay for the most part! Beautiful space with everything you could need in a bnb! Perfected located to all there is to do in download Portland with many restaurants and shops easily walkable! Having free parking was also a plus. Alice was wonderful and responsive and answered all our questions and issues when we reached out.
The space is beautiful and welcoming and wonderfully decorated. We thoroughly enjoyed it!
Great apartment. What a decor!
The loft was very comfortable and located within walking distance of everything in downtown Portland.
Beautiful place, great location! Had a great stay 😊
One of the most fabulous airbnbs -- or homes, period-- I have ever been in. Better than the photos. An architectural gem. Super central. And the stairs are not bad.

Thanks to Alice for offering this great apartment. Location was excellent for walking to restaurants and a lot of the areas of Portland we wanted to be. This might have been the first AirBnB that we stayed at so far which truly met the expectations from the photos, even perhaps surpassing our expectations on how cool of a spot it was. Super clean place, interesting architecture, fabulous light from all the windows and skylights, great views of the city, still felt like we had a lot of privacy, and the private deck was a highlight too. Would definitely want to stay here again next time we find ourselves in Portland.

I spent a vacation with my partner in Alice’s place, overall a 10/10 super comfortable and cozy, very clean smell as well, and the location had many fun activities around such as restaurants and more!! I love forward to staying here again sometime in the future!!!!
Spectacular! Clean, spacious, great vibe. Great location.
One of the most special spaces I’ve stayed in. Had an absolutely wonderful time here and would recommend to all friends and family. Thank you so much for our first memorable trip to Maine!
Alice’s place is so unique and charming! We had a great time and would definitely stay here whenever we return to Portland. Thank you Alice!

This place was amazing! So clean, beautiful, and close to restaurants and a good walking neighborhood. It was so nice to see the city wake up in the morning and go quiet at night. I think I got a suntan during the day and definitely a moontan at night while in the apartment! The views are from every angle! Definitely a come back spot!

Phenomenal location and accommodations. Alice’s place is easy to settle right into, you’ll hardly want to leave the place… but when you do the little piece of Portland that surrounds her place is great, friendly, and delicious! We were able to walk everywhere. When we come back, we will be looking for Alice’s place to stay at again! Thanks Alice!

My partner and I visit Portland as much as possible, and this was our first time staying at Alice's place. LOVED IT! Usually I like to spend much of my time walking around the city, dining out, etc. This visit was different because I found myself content with just hanging out in the apartment: reading, enjoying the sunlight and city views, and cooking. It felt like my home away from home. We hope to return for a longer visit!
Very clean, comfortable bed, close to everything in the Old Port. Would recommend!

Alice’s place was exactly as pictured and described. We loved being so close to great restaurants and shops all while having the ability to relax in such a beautiful, warm apartment. Would stay here again in a heartbeat. Thank you!
It was a great stay. Gorgeous space with so much beautiful lighting

This place is such a great spot for those visiting Portland! Right smack in the middle of town, easily walkable to all the major attractions, and truly an architectural beauty. Alice accommodated an early check-in, which was super helpful. Definitely will make this a go-to for Portland trips.

What a beautiful gem of a loft well situated in a walkable area! The space is peaceful with beautiful views of the downtown area with many windows for a bright and airy vibe. On-site parking is a breeze since this is on the top floor of a building with offices.

Pictures does not do this stay justice! This place is absolutely stunning both day and night! The place is so cutely decorated and furnished! Coming from Utah it was so awesome to stay in the heart of Portland with places in walking distance! If we ever come back to Maine this is where we will stay! Thank you!

This place was beautiful! Very well decorated and in an incredible location close to downtown and old port. We walked everywhere but was thankful for parking so we had somewhere safe to leave our car. If a sensitive sleeper, the light shining into the house at night is bright and it was noisy. However, I think this place is worth it for the location and place itself! It was the cleanest Airbnb I’ve stayed in. Would highly recommend and would stay again :) !
Great place. Great location. Look forward to staying again in the future. We had a great time.

Best place to stay!!! Bright, airy and clean. Super comfortable equipped with anything you need. Details in the apartment are all exceptional. Best location for a visit to downtown Portland. Would definitely return as we frequently visit Portland. Don’t look any further . Book it now !!!

This space is accurately described as an architectural gem! What a cool space, tons of light coming through skylights and big windows. Even in the cold of winter, the location is so close to downtown that we walked everywhere we went the whole weekend. Would absolutely love to stay again the next time we're in town.
Awesome place! Perfectly located in the Old Port. Alice was responsive and helpful! Would definitely stay again.
Amazing place, had a great stay!

This was our second time staying at Alice’s apartment, and I don’t think we would stay anywhere else when traveling to Portland.
The location is perfect- situated where all of downtown and everything on the west end is well within walking distance. We parked in the assigned lot when we arrived (for free!) and didn’t move the car at all until the end of our stay.
The apartment itself is truly wonderful. Beautiful views over downtown Portland through the massive windows, very thoughtful little details throughout the unit, comfortable furniture, and all the amenities of home.
My only “know before you go” for this apartment is that the memory foam mattress is very firm! My partner and I found it very comfortable, even though the mattress we have at home is softer- but if firm is decidedly not your jam, this may be helpful to know.
I would recommend anyone traveling to Portland stay here!
Great location.
An absolute gem. Loved the space with all of its natural light and thoughtful furnishings. Simply gorgeous. Can’t wait to return!

What a cozy spot in a wonderful location! A short walk to both the Old Port and West End.
Alice was very communicative and accommodating. Check in and check out was a breeze.

Oh my goodness. I struggled to write this reviews BECAUSE I wanted to keep your place a secret and yet I want EVERYONE to know what a perfect place you have in the historic district of Portland. We LOVED everthing about your place EVEN the stairs up to the unit. Close to everything we wanted to do, PERFECT place to enjoy the crazy wind and rain storm and very comfortable. We will definitely stay at your place again and again. Great size, fantastic windows and views, lovely kitchen and comfortable couch. Bed was DIVINE!!!

We absolutely loved everything about Alice’s place! The pictures don’t do it justice! It’s beautiful and the location is amazing. Alice is wonderful and her communication is great. We hope to come back often! Thank you for having us!
Beautiful place, super clean will stay here again when we return to Portland!

We had so much fun at this place. It's unique, lots of interesting and funky little details. The light was beautiful. so many windows. We could see the moon and the stars from the big windows in the bedroom. We parked the car and walked almost everywhere because the unit is so centrally located in downtown Portland. Comfortable bed, great shower, cool kitchen. Even a little private patio that we didn't get to use because it was so cold. But with nice weather, the patio would be such a cool place to hang out because of the view. Fabulous coffee shop is right around the corner. Be mindful that there are stairs to get from street level to the unit, then stairs up to the unit once inside the front door. But the views once you get up there are so worth it. Highly recommend this place.

One of the nicest Airbnb’s that we’ve ever stayed in.
Beautiful apartment, well designed and maintained, spotless and very clean. Directions (& instructions) were clear,concise and easy to understand. Neighborhood was busy during the day but we felt safe walking around from morning till early evening when we returned.
Location was perfect for shops, museums and other attractions.
As others have mentioned in previous reviews the city lights at night made it a bit of a challenge for sleeping (mask anyone?), especially when you’re not used to ambient light streaming in from street lights and other sources. The bed was comfortable, kitchen and bathroom had everything we needed and the living room was perfect for watching a movie or gazing out over the street scape while having morning coffee.
All n all the apartment was an A+ and we would definitely come back again…which we hope to do in the near future.
The place was beautiful and very clean! We loved staying here. Good location and lots to do nearby. Alice was very communicative throughout our stay!
Alice's place was beautiful and comfortable. The area is full of things to do and places to eat. Everything is either within walking distance or at max a 15 minute drive
Couldn’t have been more satisfied with our stay

awesome place for a stay of any length in portland. this is a lovely neighborhood and we walked to everything we wanted to do and see within the city. the apartment is roomy, modern and gorgeous and pictures do not it justice. made it hard to leave and see our friends and the sights!
only thing to consider would be if you have difficulty walking or getting up stairs, no trouble for us but those with movement challenges might find it to be a lot of stairs.
thanks again!

It's clear that the owner (whom we met briefly during our stay) put a lot of love into the design and renovation of this apartment, from the sun ray pattern of the wood on the landing, to the organic stone details on the bedroom sill. Note for people who, like myself, didn't fully think through the ramifications of all those lovely windows: the bedroom gets light in the morning *and* at night (because: city). Bring a sleep mask! Also, if you like to cook, make sure you bring any special equipment you might need. I really enjoyed this unique stay.

This home is so beautiful! There are a ton of windows and so much natural light. The decor is gorgeous. The location is totally perfect, super easy to walk to restaurants and activities. Alice is a wonderful host - always responsive and very friendly. We 100% would love to stay here again.
Beautiful, clean place with a top notch location!
This was our third stay at Alice's place & we look for availability to stay here everytime we come Portland 10/10 recommend!
Beautiful home and great location!! We would stay there again!

Great location and cool space; we would highly recommend it with a couple very fixable tweaks. Only light in the bathroom that worked was a small one in the shower. The listing mentions shampoo, soap, etc., but they were nowhere to be found. Otherwise, a great spot to stay in Portland.

This was a great place to spend a few days in Portland. It's a very well designed space, and the decor and furnishings are both interesting and very comfortable (you don't always get both!), with lots of storage and lots of light. The location is convenient, and easy free parking is a big bonus.

Lovely top floor walk-up apartment with great light, charming character, and modern finishes. Super convenient location plus on-site parking is great.
Make sure to read all the instructions and rules in the host messages to avoid charges!
Great location, funky fun space….. hope you don’t mind stairs!!

This airbnb was so awesome that my husband and I got takeout and watched a movie on Friday night instead of going out! Very cool views and prime walkable location. Just bring a sleep mask as the windows are very bright in the morning! Would love to stay again in the future.
Very walkable area. Highly recommend Georgeous Gelato for a sweet treat!
Perfect location to spend time in Portland! Great restaurants all walkable! The Airbnb was gorgeous and comfortable. We loved it all!
Nice place with interesting architecture. Central to everything in Old Port. Great location and beautiful space.

The photos don’t do the apartment justice (and the photos are pretty nice). The location is well located for walking to restaurants, the waterfront and shows.
Alice is a wonderful host who is quick to respond to questions and provided helpful information to make our stay perfect!
A great home base for your next adventure in Vacationland!

Incredible Airbnb in the perfect location!
Alice was super friendly and accommodating. We can’t wait to stay again!

The place was great. Right off the main area so it wasn’t overly crowded or loud but was a 3-5 walk to everything. Place was bright and open which made great waking up in. Our first trip to Portland went well staying here.

Very beautiful space, amazing location, very close to all the restaurants in the area with the advantage of being on a quiet street
I enjoyed every moment of my stay and felt relaxed
Parking was easy , it was behind the building which was perfect
Alice is very sweet and helpful
Great location, lovely space, appreciated the washer/dryer, onsite parking and amenities. Excellent communication with Alice. Thoroughly enjoyed the stay. Would return again.
Awesome place. I’ll definitely be staying here again!

This space is lovely and close to great restaurants, pubs, and activities to explore in Portland. The apartment was clean and well organized. It also had a homey feel to it which doesn't always happen when you stay at an Airbnb location. The decor was done with an artist's attention for detail, which made our stay that much more enjoyable and relaxing. The space has a tremendous amount of natural light and great views of downtown. There are several flights of stairs, but we had no problem getting our belonging up and down. The available outdoor patio was wonderful and a great spot to relax. Alice was responsive to any questions we had and provided clear instructions before we arrived. You will certainly enjoy your stay - I know we can't wait to go back!

My husband and I had a wonderful time staying in Alice's beautiful loft apartment. The loft was clean, spacious, had plenty of storage and a very comfortable bed and couch. The apartment is in a great location and had off street parking, which is always a plus. We would love to stay again in the future!

Cozy space just the right size for a couple or individual get away. The shower was one of my favorites thing here. So roomy and it’s beautiful. I didn’t need it but there was a nice little office area. I also loved the open concept of the main rooms! And the decor and deck! We had a great stay!
What an amazing space! We loved our time there - quiet, excellent views of the city, perfect location, well-equipped, and comfortable. We highly recommend to anyone visiting Portland.

Alice's place was great. The apartment was clean, well organized, and exactly as described in the posting. We have already discussed coming back and using this same location. It is close to multiple hubs in Portland and plenty of parking.
Absolutely would suggest to anyone.
Our only complaint, although it is already well documented, is that you will wake up with the sun. Bring an eye mask. All of the windows are absolutely worth it

Wishing we had booked a full week here! Felt like locals - and with all the delicious food around we really needed the stairs/workout! Even with my husband in a boot, what seemed like a daunting penthouse was actually super maneuverable! The private deck was lovely for morning coffee and evening cocktails (and people watching). The bathroom was like a retreat - the beautiful shower with skylight was magical. Absolutely lovely space
Awesome apartment and great location. I have been to Portland a bunch of times and this was one of the best locations. The included parking was amazing.

A lovely apartment…actually a one bedroom. Tons of windows and skylights. Nice furniture.
Location is wonderful. Five to 10 minute walk to heart of this amazing little city. Parking included a huge plus. Recommend!

Alice’s place was in a great spot of Portland walkable to anything you want to do. So many restaurants shops etc. Our only complaint would be, like others said the AC didn’t make it to the bedroom to cool, while we tried to leave the windows open, it’s in such a happening spot it’s hard to sleep with hearing all the noise from bar hoppers. Super cute and eclectic. Loved the location!

The home was clean and bright. It was a little warm in the bedroom and there are lots of windows that make it very bright early morning but we liked the location a lot.
Lots of stairs if that is an issue.

Perfect location close to Old Port ~
Beautifully and uniquely decorated; bright and spacious
Alice was a wonderful host - would stay again!

The location and architectural design is awesome. The host could really make this a great place to stay by incorporating nicer linens, maybe clean the deck, add flowers, more towels, and dishes in the kitchen. It is the bare minimum and I expected more for the price.

Alice's place is an architectural marvel with many interesting artistic details to savor. There are outstanding restaurants steps away. It's only a few minutes from the airport. We saw a great outdoor concert at Thompson's Point, also less than 10 minutes from the AirBnB. We would definitely return.

Overall an enjoyable stay, and would definitely return outside of mid-summer.
Pros:
- Great location; walkable to many restaurants, bars, and shops, as well as the waterfront.
- Lots of windows made for good views and ample natural light.
- Very modern feel and was spacious for two people.
- Well stocked kitchen (though we didn't actually end up cooking)
Cons:
- Stuffy/toasty; the A/C doesn't really reach the bedroom and the windows do not have screens, so the bedroom was hot at night.
- Some of the furniture did not match the pictures (e.g. no lounge chairs on the deck, though a metal patio set instead)
This place is amazing!! Insane location, walkable to everything and easy parking! Highly recommend this place, so unique and the private deck with a view is a huge plus! Alice was great :)
Overall loved the place. Great location!
A modern penthouse apartment that feels like it's up in the clouds. We only spent two nights, but it was comfortable and had great bars & food nearby. It was kind of a fabulous chic apartment stay.
Awesome apartment right in the heart of old port, so much to do in walking distance. Wish this was my apartment!

First impression was it was hot. Our days in Portland were in the upper 80s and humid. The AC in the main area could not keep and doesn't reach the bedroom. There are only blinds on the windows around the bed so you can't draw shades to cool the apt or for privacy in the main area.
It also needed a deep cleaning. HOWEVER, the location somewhat makes up for all of that. You are a short walk away from all of the action yet on a quiet side street. Being on the 4th floor gives a safe treehouse feel and as we settled in our appreciation grew. It's a crafty, cool, and original designed space.

100% would stay here again.
Incredible location and views.
Perfect spot to either relax or work. Located right in the heartbeat of the city.
Great location, very clean and pretty cool Airbnb. We would stay there again.
Pictures were an exact description. Quiet area with great views and within walking distance to Pubs, restaurants and downtown. Nice balcony to sit too!
Gorgeous, unique spot close to all that Old Port has to offer!

Alice was a fantastic host! She proactively sent a very thorough message detailing how to get into the building and house rules to follow. She was sure to give us her cell number if any issues came up (none did). The listing was exactly as described, it was actually even more amazing in person. My Husband and I chose this listing for our 1 year wedding anniversary celebratory trip to Portland. We absolutely loved the space. We will 100% book this listing again in the future when we return back to Portland! The location was beyond perfect. 10/10

The place is lovely and has such a charming feel to it, and the location makes it so easy to explore the city on foot. The only thing I’ll say is if you’re sensitive to light when you sleep bring an eye mask as the apartment has awesome light, but is very bright in the morning.
Alice is super clear with her instructions, and very proactive. Overall an awesome stay and host, thanks again Alice!

This loft is indeed an architectural gem -- we loved all of it. Place was immaculate, bed, couch and chairs were all super comfortable, kitchen was fully functional and it was super quiet. We had read that the unit was filled with lots of natural light and not super dark, so that was expected. Can't beat the location, perfect walking distance to downtown and waterfront, Eastern prom, etc. Would highly recommend and would totally stay again.
Amazing apartment and location! Had so much fun on the balcony, and surroundings were very walkable. Would definitely recommend staying here :)
Incredible location. I loved the place. It was just what we were looking for.

This is the best place we have ever stayed with air bnb. It’s a great location. Easy free parking, close to so much coolest place ever, I want to steal all the plants.
Go eat at EvenTide, get a beer and sit out back and view the harbor at Liquid Riot, have breakfast at Becky’s Diner

The location was great for walking the whole weekend. Plenty of parking. Airbnb was clean and spacious. Loved the windows. I wish the bedroom windows had drapes. Sun woke us up at 6 am both days but loved everything else. Would stay again
Great location and convenient off-street parking, would recommend!

Staying at Alices’s place was an amazing experience. The design and architecture of the apartment is outstanding, and the experience of staying there enhances the Portland experience. The location is perfect, as we could access the downtown, old port shops and restaurants, and the waterfront very easily all by foot. There was a very unique antique shop a couple doors down that is definitely worth checking out. It was also nice to have easy off street parking. Alice was quick to respond and very helpful, and our lockbox check in was streamline.
If your going to Portland and this is in your budget, i highly recommend it, as I think this must be one of the coolest places you could stay to enjoy the city.
I’ve honeymooned, spent anniversaries and birthdays here. This place is the perfect spot to experience Portland.

Absolutely beautiful space within walking distance to everything. Great quiet neighborhood as well. As mentioned in previous posts, the stairs are no joke (especially for those of us from Florida and/or flat land!!) and the apartment is VERY bright. Beautiful for sunrise and sunset but not great for sleeping in. Many comments on the comfortable bed (and it was) however, to note, it is very FIRM. We had a wonderful time and would recommend to friends and family.

Calling this an architectural gem is 100% accurate! The inside was wonderful and had all of the items we needed in addition the view (it is on the 4th floor). Alice was super helpful in making check-in and such easy and flawless. We will definitely return - lots of places to eat and see within 10 minute walk!

Beautiful apartment within walking distance of many restaurants and stores. Loved how the space is used and decorated. Private terrace was perfect for us.
Highly recommended.

This rental is in a great spot in Old Port. It is a few minutes walk from all of the great restaurants and bars in that neighborhood. We have stayed in Old Port a few times and this was by far the best accommodations we’ve had there. Alice was extremely nice and her place was better than advertised. We stayed there with our 4 month old daughter and had ample space to setup a pack and play for her to sleep in and space for me and my wife as well. We will definitely be booking this rental again.
This place is stunning, the location could not be better within walking distance to everything. The bed is super comfortable too !

Alice's apartment was absolutely beautiful and looked exactly like in the photos. There is a ton of natural light throughout the apartment, and the architectural details made it even more special. Even though it's just minutes from Old Port, the area is very quiet after hours and I didn't have any issues with noise. I highly recommend Alice's place!
The space was more beautiful than we expected. The skylights and windows made the apartment really special.
The place was better than expected! Walking distance from restaurants and activities. 10/10 would recommend!
Wow! This apartment is stunning and even more beautiful than the photos. We loved our stay and ended up spending our last night in the apartment just to enjoy the view. Definitely recommend!
Home was exactly like listing, very clean and comfortable. We throughly enjoyed our stay.

We had an awesome stay here and would highly recommend. It was a peaceful, tranquil apartment yet had easy access to downtown restaurants and activities. Beautiful surroundings in the apartment with plants, decor and every detail was thought of, making it the perfect getaway.
The absolute perfect spot to do a walking tour of all Portland had to offer.
Lovely spot. Amazing value. And a perfect location!
This place is amazing! It’s just as described and close to so many fun things to see in the city.

hands down my favorite place to stay in Portland and perhaps my favorite Airbnb experience! Alice's place has such a wonderful, welcoming energy that puts you at ease the moment you step in the door. Very quiet, very comfortable, well-positioned in the city, and somehow more gorgeous than the photos can convey! I can't wait to go back!
Great location! Perfect walkable location to restaurant and bars. Very sunny spot.
Super cute place! Great location. Short walk to everything we came to do.
Beautiful place, right in the middle of Portland! Would definitely stay again!

Alice's place was a great spot for our weekend getaway. She provided excellent instruction which made it very easy to check in and start relaxing. Everything we were looking to do was walkable and the apartment has great views of the city. We will definitely be back.
Great spot to relax and unwind while you explore Portland Maine.
Alice was quick to respond to questions and was helpful. The place is very clean and unique. Good location in close proximity of many things to do. Would stay here again.
Pretty apartment and convenient location.
Beautiful and unique space in a convenient location! Highly recommend.

Alice's place in Portland was amazingly beautiful, well-maintained, conveniently located and highly functional. Everything was so well-designed and artistic. I was there for several cold, blustery days in January on a work-related trip and rarely ever needed an Uber to get to the meetings and restaurants I needed to reach on Commercial Street, even though it involved stepping over a lot of snow and ice. I would look to stay at this place again if I came back.
One of my only small issues was with using the lockbox to get inside. There are two in addition to the coded door lock, so it was a bit confusing as to which code went where. But once you get the hang of that, it was no big deal. Another small issue was that much of the place is glass, so city lights shined in all hours and it was never fully dark for sleeping purposes. But again, you adjust. Lastly, there are few stores within walking distance, so be sure to bring your own soap and shampoo.
Highly recommend!
If you have the opportunity to come to Portland, don’t miss it. This lovely apartment made it all reachable and enjoyable.
The apartment was beautiful and looked exactly like the photos. Within walking distance to Old Port shopping and restaurants. Short drive to grocery stores. Conveniently located and very, very nice.

I generally look for just a place to cook and sleep. This air bnb was unique with the open concept kitchen which I appreciate and the amazing lighting. Watching the sunrise and set from this apartment was a particularly satisfying. That being said the bed was memory foam and the bathroom/shower was beautiful. 10/10
The place was even prettier than the photos. Location couldn’t have been better. I see myself returning here in the future!
Wonderful place and a great location! Very clean, comfortable and unique. Alice was super helpful and responsive. We will definitely recommend it to others and we hope to return again!
Gorgeous place. We loved the views and the style. Alice was a great communicator.
We had an amazing stay at Alice’s property in Portland Maine. The location was perfect and the unit was very cool and in a great location. I would recommend to a friend or family member.
Perfect location to be able to walk all around Portland, and such a cool, unique, clean space! Will be back!

This was the second time staying in Alice’s loft. It’s one of the most chic airbnbs I’ve ever stayed in! Great views of Portland and super cool space. Very clean and neat place! Will definitely book again!

This location was great!! The home was nice, peaceful, and clean the building is very quiet and the location is great! Beautiful view of the city and an awesome view for the sun rises and sun sets! Definitely would recommend this home for a stay for someone else and definitely would love to stay again if had the chance!
This condo was nicely designed, exceptionally bright and pleasant. Skylights gave both light and great views. It's high enough to be quiet and peaceful. Thank you Alice!
Beautiful place. Beautiful city.
Beautiful space, fantastic location, great host. Had a great experience, and will recommend this property to any friends visiting. Perfect location for our vacation in Portland!

My Wife and I we absolutely delighted with the studio apartment; it was perfect! The place looked brand new, impeccably clean and the architectural features were amazing. It's truly a place that we would love to stay at again! Thank you for such an awesome experience!

Alice’s place was a perfect spot for us to spend our “mini moon”. It was walking distance from restaurants and bars and easily accessible. The natural light in the place was beautiful. We would definitely stay again!

This was our second stay at this well appointed loft space🥰it is one of our favorite stays for sure. The openness, plants, lighting, and windows make this space dreamy and comfortable. It’s always perfectly clean, and no clutter. We love how close this is to everything downtown Portland has to offer. Walkable distance to venues, top restaurants and bars, museums and shopping. Very safe overnight parking which we love in a city setting.

Came for my birthday week and had the most amazing time! This apartment is gorgeous and homey, we didn't want to leave! Perfect location to walk around and explore. Alice gave me the best rec's for food and things to do in the area! Worth every penny and can't wait to come back again!

Alice’s place is as described. It’s beautiful and well appointed. The location is great and the shower is too tier. Alice does prompt you with additional charges that can be incurred if you ruin things or don’t follow her homes rules. I hadn’t had that before and it rubbed me the wrong way, especially when paying top dollar. It’s a great place though- enjoy!

I highly recommend this AirBnB for your stay in Portland. The location allowed me to walk to almost everyplace that I wanted to go. Alice’s place provided a unique place to stay with all the amenities that you’ll need. Communication was clear and I enjoyed every minute of my stay.
We LOVED this place. Perfect for two. Convenient and classy. Gorgeous windows.
Beautiful, sun filled apartment right in the middle of Portland. Easy check in and great to have off street parking.

Alice’s place was a wonderful space flooded with natural light and beautiful plants. The location is within walking distance to just about everything! I was glad I read the reviews as there are no shades in the bedroom and it is very ,very bright in the morning. I packed us sleep masks and it was fine. The only con I had was the earlier then usual check out time, Before 10am and she stated she would be there at 10am
Sharp to start cleaning. So if you’re a late sleeper while on vaca keep that in mind. Otherwise it was a great experience.

This place is really cool...the architecture and proximity to downtown were worth the price to stay. As indicated by others, there are a fair amount of stairs to climb (so be prepared), bring a sleep mask (as the bedroom gets bright early), and the bedroom temp cannot be regulated but these aren't detriments by any stretch...just things to be aware of. You won't be disappointed!
This is a rental well worth visiting. The light throughout the apartment is beautiful the views are excellent. The apartment is architecturally spectacular and very clean and comfortable.

A gorgeous apartment with tons of character and natural sunlight. very comfortable bed! excellent location.
clean, quiet and had all the amenities you could need. easy check in/out. can't wait to go back to Portland and stay there again!!!!
Picture perfect location quiet easiest parking views for days - a true fancy tree fort like experience !

Not sure you can get a better location in Portland, you can walk to everything bars restaurants shopping, you name it. Alice is a great host and super communicative. Apartment is very cute and we loved staying there
Excellent location, pretty much walkable to the major attractions in Portland. Unique and very cool decorations and design. Lovely art gallery with equally as lovely owner on the bottom floor.
Alice’s place is awesome. Had a fantastic stay. Location is excellent and the place itself is tremendous. Alice was extremely quick to respond to our questions. Look forward to our next stay!
Perfect place to stay! Location is astounding and the apartment is beautiful! Great communication as well!

Lots of homes are beautiful. Lots of homes are in a great location. But there’s a level of care and comfort you cannot manufacture or stage, and that’s what I felt the minute I entered this truly special place. Light and plants filled every corner. The views are uplifting and quirky. The deck is a respite after a filling meal or a long walk around town. The details reveal just how much work was put into making this a home.
I’ve spent a lot of time in Portland but never had a home base there. This made me feel like a local, and I loved every minute of it. The kitchen is great with tons of room (even if the stove befuddled me, Alice sent me a video that helped). The living room is incredibly comfy, and the shower is something out of a spa.
Really did not want to leave. I’ll dream of my next stay here often.
Great location and lots of natural light. Easy access to everywhere you want to go!
Lots of natural light, beautiful views of Portland, lots of space for two, comfortable bed and Alice was really easy to communicate with. Would stay again!

A very thoughtfully designed apartment, as you can see from the photos. Easy walking distance to great restaurants and the historic wharf area. So many clever decorations and amazing woodwork. Someone put a lot of love and thought into incorporating the old and the new. The possible negatives for some people are the stairs and the bedroom is extremely bright( we brought sleep masks) but it was still challenging. We'd stay there again in a heartbeat!
The apartment is quite beautiful and you couldn't ask for a better location. 2 blocks to Commercial Ave and 2 blocks to Congress St.
Beautiful home in a great location
Perfectly situated in between downtown and waterfront. The loft itself is incredibly beautiful - we were amazed!
Very gorgeous place. Extremely unique compared to other places I have stayed. Would highly recommend if staying in Portland.
Great location! On a relatively quiet street while very close to everything downtown. The place itself is tops! Amazing accommodations and loved hanging out on the private deck!

We greatly enjoyed our weekend stay at Alice's. Its location was perfect and gave us great walking access to much of the peninsula. The apartment itself was clean and well appointed with plenty of space to relax and enjoy the beautiful views. Check-in and check-out were easy and Alice responded quickly to messages and accommodated our needs perfectly. I would highly recommend a stay at Alice's lovely Portland apartment.

What a perfect place to stay in Portland! It is within walking distance to everything we wanted to do, off street parking and beautiful. It is immaculate! The patio is lovely.All questions were answered in minutes.Very quiet. We will be back.
As advertised, beautiful sun filled place in a great location. We will be back!
Awesome location, suite has a very unique design to it, and the host is great and communicates fast with any questions that you have. Check in and out is very easy.
Wonderful location and design! Hot days and nights are tricky as A/C works in main room but doesn’t get to bedroom well, and you’ll wake up to full sunlight early (no shades) but I loved that :)
Perfect location, beautiful place, wonderful host. Will be back!

This was a unique, beautiful space in a perfect location. Very clean and special design.
Just a couple things to note for those inquiring about the space.. It is a couple of flights to get up to the apartment. It’s no joke if you aren’t used to stairs daily. And the bedroom gets very bright, which is not a bad thing.. but be prepared to not really sleep in. We even brought eye masks but they didn’t do the trick very well. The only other thing to comment on is the bedroom was pretty toasty since the AC unit is in the living room/kitchen space. I’m sure it’s not that bad during other times of the year, but we picked a very hot season so it was just a bit too warm back in bedroom. The living space did not have that problem at all.
However, even with those couple of mild things to note, the apartment was breathtaking and unique. By far the most unique Air B n B we have stayed.
Very clean and beautiful. The exposed brick is very lovely. The shower is very nice. We loved all the windows and the greenery! The kitchen is very grand and beautiful as well, although we didn’t end up using it because of the far too many restaurants to eat out.
The spot is in a perfect location to all the amazing restaurants. It’s just a tad off the main strip of the busyness, so it is pretty quiet and low key, but close enough to not miss out on anything because it is all pretty much in walking distance.
Thank you for the lovey stay! It was gorgeous!
Adorable apartment in a perfect location!
Can’t wait to come back! Amazing location and such a great vibe in the apartment. The outdoor space and parking are a huge bonus. Host was fantastic - easy, awesome experience!

Great place to stay and central location to the rest of the city--cute interior design with modern and rustic decor; was nice that there was air conditioning in the living room (we visited during a heat wave) although the bedroom didn't have an AC unit to our knowledge so was just a bit hotter than the rest of the place.

We came to Portland for our 25th anniversary and could not have dreamed of a better place to stay. The location is perfect—we walked everywhere. The apartment is even more beautiful than the pictures. Alice was a great host—easy and quick communication!
Alice’s place is perfectly located in the old port area! Walking distance to everything you need!! Beautifully decorated, we felt so comfortable in this space, we’d stay again in a heartbeat!
Great place to stay, conveniently located to everything.
Perfect location
Lovely place to stay in downtown Portland!
Absolutely loved Alice’s place. It’s easy to walk everywhere and Alice was super helpful and accommodating! Would stay here again!
you can not beat the location, and everything inside is as gorgeous as you'd wish

This is a wonderful property. We are a couple travelling and working and there were separate spaces for us to be very comfortable. Great location to access most things and the home is equipped for cooking and ordering in easily. It’s a couple of flights up to the penthouse so you need to be prepared for that, but the apartment is worth a few flights of stairs.

This is a stunning unit and even nicer in person than the pictures reveal. It was spotless, comfortable, and has a ton of natural light (worth bringing a sleep mask unless you rise with the sun). A very short walk from pretty much anything in Old Port.
