Really tasteful apartment that is close to everything. Vickie makes sure you have everything you need for an enjoyable stay. Can’t wait to come back!
A nice space for 2 or 3 people close to Portland and Cape Elizabeth with lots to do in the area. Clean and homey. Great value!
Warm and cozy place, nice little touches from Vicky, a great location, thank you Vicky, we had great time !

Vickie's location is wonderful for dog lovers and bikers. Our dog Oscar enjoyed playing on Willard beach with lots of other dogs after dinner each night, when the beach is open for dogs. This is also a perfect location for road bikes. Cottage Road leads to a wide range of rolling hills routes through the countryside.
Vickie’s place was a great place to stay at! It was clean, cozy and close to many different places.

We had a great time at Vickie’s. She was very responsive and, even though she was out of town, was able to quickly resolve an issue we had with some of the outlets. Her place was an easy drive into the city where we were able to easily find street parking. Vicky left fruits, coffee, creamer (including non-dairy, which was a plus for me). The kids especially loved the popcorn and Kind bars that came in handy for snacks. The place was well-Maintanence and clean. Would definitely stay there again.
Vickie’s place was as advertised. It is in a nice neighborhood with food and breakfast just a short walk away, while still being in a relaxed area.

Great place to stay! Vickie was a wonderful host & we can't wait to visit So Po again! The house is cozy and was perfect for my hubby & our dog. You're close enough to all the restaurants & shopping that Portland has to offer, but also far enough to enjoy the downtime. Willard Beach was in walking distance, and dogs can be off their leash between 7-9am & 7-9pm. Highly recommended if you have a playful pup! Willard Beach is also the spot that my guy asked me to MARRY HIM!! So, it will forever hold a special place for us. Another reason why we will definitely be back!
Thanks for your hospitality, Vickie!! Cheers!!

We really enjoyed staying here! Its a cute little apartment and very clean. We enjoyed walking around the south Portland neighborhood. The proximity to beaches and downtown Portland was the main appeal. Having access to laundry and the full kitchen were both very convenient. I felt more comfortable staying here than in a motel/hotel. We had privacy, but Vicki was communicative and accessible. We had a great little getaway.

Vickie was a great host and her place is in an amazing location just a short drive from the Old Port. Her guest unit is very clean, quaint, and has everything that one would need for a brief Portland getaway. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a place to stay.

Quaint, cute, homey and comfortable! What a great little apartment. Vickie was extremely quick with responses and was very helpful. She gives you lots of tips and recommendations. The apartment was very clean and full of personal touches that made it homey and comfy. Very close to lots of food and places to explore. We would definitely stay again if we come to Portland. Excellent price for what you get. We loved our stay.

really a nice place to stay, perfect for 2.
nice neighbourhood too, and not far from Portland.
This was a perfect place a little get away this weekend. She even put out a note and cinnamon buns for our 1st wedding anniversary. Close to downtown Portland and even let our dog stay with us
Darling, quiet space for a cozy Portland adventure. A few tasty restaurants and a cute light house within easy walking distance, and downtown is a super cheap/quick Uber away!
The host was great!
Vickie's place is fantastic! Very spacious and only a short drive away from the Old Portland. She also gave us plenty of suggestions. Overall we are very satisfied with our stay at Vickie's place.

The perfect place to land after traveling for two weeks. Vickie’s place was so cozy and exactly what we needed. We walked downtown to a nice sushi spot on 40 minutes and grabbed some pizza down the road about a ten minute walk away. Would definitely stay here again!

Our time at Vicki’s was everything we could ask for! Quiet neighborhood in South Portland but just a quick drive to Old Port etc. The place was very homey and it was nice to have so many amenities at our disposal. Couldn’t have asked for a better place to stay for our first visit to Maine!
This is a great place to stay I South Portland. The layout is adorable. Very private. Very cozy.

Great location in South Portland; takes 10-15 minutes to drive to Portland and the neighborhood is nice for walking the dog, getting coffee and bagels (Scratch Bakery), and feels very safe. The private suite is perfect size for a couple or small family (3-4), and is dog friendly. Vickie was always quick to respond and so very friendly. We hope to come back soon!
Convenient location and all the comforts of home. Easy access to downtown Portland and to nearby beaches and state parks. Great spot for a weekend away.

Vickie’s place is in a great location! It’s within walking distance to a couple great coffee shops, some restaurants, a little shopping place, and even a brewery!
The place itself was nice and clean upon our arrival and check in was super easy. So nice that sheets and towels were provided - one less thing to worry about when traveling! Also loved that Vickie allows dogs - bringing my dog made the trip so much more fun!
Would highly recommend staying here!

The apartment is very cozy with an artsy decorative feel in a historic large home. The cleanliness was top notch and it was convenient to have access to the washer and dryer.
Vickie was a wonderful hostess. The kitchen had everything I needed and more. There was even some fresh fruit and extras in the refrigerator.
I was traveling with my dog and this was place was perfect to accommodate myself and my furry friend.
The location was perfect for sight seeing, the beaches, walking trails, and Portland. Everything was just minutes away. Many wee even walking distance.
I plan to revisit the area and hope to stay at Vickie’s place again.
Great location. Cute place. Has all the necessary amenities.

We had a great time at Vickie's place! She was a very welcoming host with thoughtful suggestions ready for the area. The place itself was great and is essentially a private apartment that's a five minute drive outside of downtown Portland. The living room was perfect for our toddler to sleep in- would definitely recommend to someone traveling with a young child.
MUCH better than any hotel I’ve ever stayed in. So many nice little touches. It’s very clear Vickie cares about the people who will be staying there.

Vickie was an awesome host! She made us feel welcome, and was even sweet to our shy puppy. The space itself is more than enough for a couple. It has everything you need. Though it is NOT in Portland city proper, it is still only a few miles away in suburbia, which makes the commute into the hotspots easy! Thank you, Vickie!

Vickie’s place was great! The space was exactly how it looked online. The apartment is also in such a great location. 5 minute drive from Willard beach, right down the street from Scratch bagels, and just a short drive to all of the phenomenal food in downtown Portland. Highly recommend!

The apartment is located in a nice residential area, it is well equipped with everything you need including washer and dryer.
We stayed with 2 kids and we we happy with the apartment.
We recommend this place 100% to any future guest.
Thanks !!

Cozy, comfy and well-located, just minutes by car from downtown Portland. When we checked in following a long day on the road we were delighted to find a bowl of fresh fruit and a partially stocked fridge, among many other thoughtful touches. We always looked forward to returning to our little SoPo pad after our sorties into the city and beyond.
Absolutely recommend. The location is great and the accommodation is great. I would absolutely stay there again.
She supplied every little thing you might need for toiletries and breakfast items. Comfy bed with extra pillows and nice decor. Nice quiet neighborhood.
Beautiful little very comfortable apartment. Vickie is a very energetic host, good advice. We recommend this place.

Sweet, well-appointed and well-
stocked apartment - seltzers, snacks and even a W/D - Vickie's place was in a great location to explore Portland, South Portland and Cape Elizabeth. Really enjoyed our stay and highly recommend!

Came to experience all Portland had to offer and was so excited to stay at Vickie's! The place was only a short drive to any location we wanted to visit. And it was great to come home to after a long day. Will recommend to any friends staying in the area!

Vickie’s South Portland home was lovely - the apartment was cozy, sparkling clean and has everything we needed for a perfect trip. Communication was great and we even had a chance to chat about the area! Would love to return.

This apartment will steal your heart!! We felt right at home, and although we did not have a car, found easy transportation into and around Portland. Vickie is a friendly and hospitable host. She has great local recommendations and we will surely be back for a future visit!
Vickie’s place was very conveniently located and the perfect space for a couple traveling together. We hope to come back soon!
great convenient place to stay

Really enjoyed my stay at Vickie’s place! It’s super cute and more spacious than I anticipated. Lots of homey and convenient touches are included (snacks, fruit, condiments, laundry detergent, an AC unit, seltzer water in the fridge, ice cream in the freezer). The location is also great - South Portland is lovely AND you can get into Portland proper very easily. Vickie was prompt and thorough before, during and after my stay, and still managed to give me my space and privacy - something I really appreciated on this particular trip. Would highly recommend!
Vickie's apartment is very quaint. The location is great, with a wonderful coffee shop near by. She was a gracious host and I would definitely stay there again the next time I am in Portland.
We had a nice stay at Vickie's appartment. The location is perfect for heading into downtown Portland (about 5 minutes) and near beautiful spots in South Portland!
Very nice place. Nicely decorated. Has necessities in the kitchen. Very clean. Situated in a walkable neighborhood.

This was one of the most thoughtfully appointed and furnished Airbnb’s we’ve had the privilege to stay in. Everything was as described, the location was great, and Jeannette is an AMAZING host. There were generous amenities, and everything was well-organized and spacious for cooking, sleeping, working, relaxing, etc. It really felt like you were “at home” or the guest of someone who knew us well and set up everything to meet our needs. We would definitely stay again!
Wonderful host, peaceful surroundings walkable to all places. Enjoyed our stay.

Airbnb was in the heart of East Portland Maine. 10-20min to walk to downtown maine. The pictures do not do this Airbnb justice; it has more space than expected & a relaxing atmosphere to absorb. This is on the first floor of a two story building - so you will hear footsteps. Would highly recommend spending the weekend in this breathtaking place with seagulls squawking & fresh breeze whipping.

Jeanette’s place is fantastic! She is a flexible, responsive, gracious, and hospitable host. The apartment is spacious, comfortable, well-equipped, and tastefully decorated. The location is close to local markets, cafes, restaurants, and just blocks from the beautiful Eastern Promenade. It is also walkable to multiple breweries and the amenities of the Old Port and Downtown. I recommend Jeanette’s place without reservation and fully intend to stay with her again!

My friend and I had a wonderful weekend in Portland! Jeannette’s place was beautiful, clean, and inviting. The house was equipped with everything that we needed and very comfortable. Street parking was easy and always accessible. Jeannette does a great job giving local recommendations, most of which are within walking distance. Not only was Old Port about a 7-minute drive away, but you are also a few streets up from the beautiful water views of the Eastern Promenade. Would absolutely stay here again.
Wonderful spot for a getaway in Portland! About a 10 minute walk downtown to plenty of attractions and restaurants. The place was very clean and safe. Would stay here again!
The place was so nice! We loved it for our girl’s weekend. Super clean and pretty. Nicely decorated and in a good location.

This is the second time I've stayed here. I would happily return. It is such a bright and sunny apartment with a surprising amount of space. The place is kept really clean and the kitchen is extremely well outfitted. (I love the glassware and plates - so pretty).
Munjoy Hill is a great neighborhood to stay in and this house is so central to so many different locations. Parking on the street is very easy. And the host had great restaurant recommendations! All in all a great stay!
This was a great place to stay. So roomy bright and comfortable! I would definitely stay here again.

This place was amazing. Convenient since it was walkable to Old Port, quiet, plenty of parking, and the view of the Eastern Promenade was unbeatable. Apartment was cozy and had the essentials. Would recommend this AirBnB 10/10 every time.

Been coming to Portland for years, this was maybe the best place we stayed. I love the eastern promenade so it was nice to be a stone throw from that, then .6 miles walkable from all our favorite places.
Will stay here again easily.
Romantic getaway with out kids for a couple
Lovely stay for a fall weekend in Portland! Will be back!
Perfect spot for a couple! Very nice walkable neighborhood, conveniently located next to restaurants and a grocery mart. Very clean and all the amenities you need for a little weekend getaway!
Awesome Airbnb with great amenities and a super convenient location! Would totally stay again :)

Jeannette’s lovely apartment was perfect for our stay. It’s spacious, light, well-designed and filled with attractive art. The apartment was spotless with a well-equipped kitchen. And the location was ideal. Although parking was abundant, we were happy that we didn’t need to use our car at all. A number of fun restaurants, shops, interesting attractions – and of course, the Eastern Promenade – were all within short walking distances.
Our visit coincided with some stormy weather, but everything was so close by that we hardly minded. And the apartment was so comfortable that we spent one cozy afternoon sprawled in the living room, reading and watching a movie. Jeannette is also a thoughtful host, and she responds quickly and communicates clearly, making everything so easy.
We’ve already promised ourselves another visit to Portland next year, and we’ll plan it so that we can stay in Jeannette’s apartment, because we can’t imagine a better spot.

We ended up here after another vacation rental had a major leak and we had to vacate. We booked and were communicating with Jeannette after just an hour, which was so appreciated since we were already in Portland, stranded.
She worked to get us into the property well in advance of check-in (we were so grateful)! The property is adorable and decorated with the most interesting artwork! The main rooms get lots of bright light while the bedroom offers room darkening blinds for great sleep! Everything is nicely set up, and everything you could need is available!
This property is easily walkable to most Portland attractions and restaurants (just know there will be some uphill on the way back 😊).
We loved Portland and will most definitely be returning and checking for availability here on our next visit!

We had a great stay at Jeannette’s place. The apartment was incredibly clean and very well decorated. Parking close by on the street was never an issue for us and we enjoyed how quiet the neighborhood is. Highly recommend!

What a delightful, charming place! Tastefully furnished and decorated, very homey and comfortable. You can’t go wrong with this neighborhood, which is quiet and has easy access to neighborhood stores and restaurants, Portland’s stunning eastern promenade along the ocean, and is even quite walkable to downtown. Street parking was effortless. There were many little touches we liked, including the availability of an electric kettle, a cute teapot, and a variety of teas in addition to coffee and coffeemaker. Highly recommend. We will keep this place in mind for all future trips to Portland!
Well decorated and equipped, the apartment was comfortable and convenient. The Munjoy Hill neighborhood is a great base for exploring Portland.

This was the perfect ending to our anniversary road trip. The home was comfortable, spotlessly clean, and beautiful with plants and art. We had everything that we needed and check-in instructions were clear and easy to follow. The kitchen was well stocked and we enjoyed breakfast at home both days. Had dinner at The Front Room close by and it was delicious and fun. We would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it! Thank you, Jeannette!

Wonderful spot. Definitely felt even bigger than in the photos. Great quiet neighborhood. It’s a little far from the center of town so we took some short Uber rides when it was very warm out. Really close to eastern promenade that was gorgeous.
This is a special location as it is within walking distance to the water. Very clean and beautiful decorating.

Had a great long weekend at Jeannette's in Portland. The apartment itself is very clean, and inviting with great natural light. Although we didn't spend much time at the apartment itself as we exploring everything the city had to offer, it was a perfect place for a couple to lay their head down. The location of Jeannette's is perfect, you're on the quieter side of Portland but still only a 15 minute walk to Old Port where most of the restaurants and shops are. Would absolutely stay there again.
Great location, clean and comfortable apartment, walkable. Zero issues.
Highly recommend! Lovely place, lovely location, lovely hosts.
A wonderful, peaceful place to stay. Walkable to Old Port. Would stay here again.

Jeannette’s home was perfect for our Portland getaway! The space was clean and homey, just like the photos, and the neighborhood was beautiful and lovely to explore. It was a nice walk along the waterfront to get to the old port neighborhood, and there were a lot of cute cafes and restaurants even closer as well. Jeannette was a super responsive host - would definitely stay here again!

Such a lovely place to stay and what a fantastic location, short walk to the water, very peaceful, and close to all things downtown. We enjoyed coffee in the morning on the front porch and we appreciated a pitcher of cold water in the refrigerator waiting for us. The interior was decorated so cute, it was homey and cozy, modern and just perfection. I love her plants!! We will absolutely stay here again and again. It was easy to get to and parking was easy as well. Great communication, easy to work with. We'll be back next summer and plan to stay here again! We rate this 10 out of 10!

What a great place and friendly hosts.
The home is wonderful, immaculate and artfully arranged and appointed.
5 stars all around.

The host and location were lovely! She had great recommendations on restaurants and must see places in the area. The unit was very spacious, comfortable and clean, along with being very close to the bay and picturesque views. I would definitely book this again!
This was a perfect spot along the promenade, tucked away from downtown but within walking distance to great restaurants and all Portland has to offer.

Jeannette’s place was located near some prime real estate on the eastern promenade/east end beach. Go get some good food from some amazing food trucks and check out the view! Very close to the casco bay lines if you want to take the ferry to any of the islands. Place was great in a beautiful location.

Great spot, close to Washington Ave., where my daughter lives. The living space was incredibly well appointed, including wall hangings, artwork, etc. Felt like home. Jeanette was very accomodating and responded to my few questions almost immediately. Next time I stay in Portland I hope to have access to their place again.
Lawrence N.

Will 100% return to Jeanette’s place.
Staying in the east end really made our Portland experience.
Beautiful place to stay, within walking distance of Old Port. Great home base to visit all the surrounding areas.

We had a much too short but perfect stay in this lovely home. Close to both water and downtown Portland, the home is immaculate, very comfortable and extremely quiet. We want to spend more time in Portland since some relatives have moved there, and we now know where we will be staying. You will love this place!
Amazing place in a wonderful location. Close to the water and a short walk to the downtown area. Would love to stay again!
Very cute and spacious place in a quaint neighborhood near bakeries, bars, and the water. Host was easy to communicate with. I would absolutely stay again and try to stay for longer!

This really is a lovely apartment. Perfect for two people, it felt homey and comfortable. It is very clean and had everything we needed for our short stay. Parking on the street was easy. Portland is very walkable and there are several great restaurants close to the apartment. Also very near the Eastern Promenade. No drawbacks.
Absolutely loved our stay. Super easy communication, amazing location, very fair price, and great space. Would happily love to rebook sometime in the future!
Absolutely beautiful place for 2 for a nice Portland getaway. The apartment is beautiful and you'll feel right at home. Responsive host, great location, and easy parking!

Jeanette was quick to respond. I needed to cancel the last day of our visit and there was no problem. We asked for an early check in and a late check out and there was no problem.
Beautiful neighborhood with a park overlooking the river could be viewed from the home. Cute markets, restaurants, and bakeries/coffee places within a short walk! A bit of a walk but not too much and using a path next to the water is Commercial where the Waterfront is (great shops).
We plan to check availability here first for our next visit to Portland.
Thanks Jeanette!

The place was nicely decorated and very clean and comfortable. Had everything one would need in the kitchen and bathroom. Beautiful ocean view 2 blocks away, and very walkable to points of interest downtown. Jeannette was extremely responsive when asking questions. Would highly recommend this place if you travel to Portland.
Great space and location. Would come back for sure!

The place was lovely. I arrived late on the first night and Jeanette left a few lights on, which was so nice. Checkin was super easy. The east end is an easy walk to so many places and the trail along the shore is just blocks away. There are some great coffee shops/bakery and restaurants just a few blocks away. I would definitely recommend this place.

Jeanette’s place was even better than we expected and was a perfect location for visiting Portland. It is beautifully appointed and we felt at home right away. It is very cozy and the bed was comfortable.
Jeanette is a lovely host and very responsive. We had a little confusion around the door code and she immediately resolved the situation. She was flexible when we needed a little extra time during checkout.
We will definitely look to stay here when we visit Portland again.

We loved our stay here. The location is great - we loved the view out the living room windows and the walkability / peace of the neighborhood. This place also has amenities for a great stay (I.e. coffee, tea, shampoo, conditioner, hand lotion, a well stocked kitchen). Jeanette was super helpful when I reached out to her with questions and wanted to make sure we had a great stay - would recommend staying here!
Beautiful place and wonderful location. Thank you!
Everything about this place is wonderful. The host is responsive, flexible and helpful. The neighborhood is exactly what we wanted. We may be back to this place.
Easily the best air bnb we've stayed in Portland. The space is much bigger in person too. Can't wait to book again!

Jeannette was a wonderful and accommodating host. Her place was beautiful, clean and homey. We just loved the location and everything was there that we needed. This was our first Airbnb experience and we loved it.
Cool spot in a great neighborhood. Easy access to all Portland has to offer. Host was easy to reach, helpful, and flexible. I will recommend to family and friends.
Casually design-centered, this apartment let us feel right at home. A winner!

What a great weekend! The apartment was very clean, very nicely decorated, and in just about the perfect location to walk and bike all around Portland. We especially loved the full kitchen and the proximity to the waterfront. Would definitely book again, and would highly recommend this listing to anyone looking for a relaxing weekend away.

We knew while just driving up to the space that it was going to be perfect. The location was more than expected and then some. Also the pictures don’t do the actual space justice you have a lot of room. Jeannette was also very flexible and accommodating with any questions we had, for anyone looking to stay in Portland this won’t disappoint!

Great place as advertised. Within easy walking distance to great food and coffee. We walked to Casco bay which is just a few blocks and has a beautiful green space with awesome views. A slightly longer walk the other direction will take you into downtown/commercial street/old port. Clean, charming apartment in a lovely and safe neighborhood.

Bright, clean, well-appointed, and very comfortable! This apartment was a great home base by the Eastern Promenade for exploring all Portland has to offer. Great communication from the host, cooks' kitchen, comfy bed. Thanks, Jeanette!

This was the perfect place for my husband and I to stay for the weekend in Portland! The apartment was clean, comfortable and had everything we needed. Check in was so easy and we could walk to everywhere within 20 minutes! The neighborhood is nice and quiet and we had a great weekend. I will definitely stay here again.
Spacious, beautifully appointed, and comfortable! Perfect location in Portland. Just a short walk to markets and restaurants!
We loved staying here! Beautiful, clean and an amazing location. Would recommend to a friend.
Jeannette was an excellent host and the property was perfect! Short walk to the water and plenty of free parking. Would definitely recommend!

Jeannette and her husband are incredible hosts. I think they said we were some of their first guests, but they seem like pros at this point. My wife and I stayed for 2 weeks and sincerely enjoyed their cozy home-apartment. We loved everything about it and have missed the East End since leaving this week! Everything was great: towel service, the home decorating, the convenience--it's close to everything you could want. The place is cozy, yet roomy, very comfortable, and well stocked. Wifi is great for working from home with 2 people on video calls a fair amount, no issues at all. We would've stayed longer if we could've, and would 1000% percent stay here again if we ever get the chance. Do yourselves a favor and stay here if you can.
Lovely appartment in a great location. Close to the the water and only a 15min walk to the downtown area!

The apartment was lovely, as described, and in a great location - a block from the bay, with coffee shops, restaurants within easy walking distance as well.
Jeannette was very responsive and helpful, I’d be very happy to stay here again if I get to return to Portland!

I can’t say enough great things about my stay here. My wife and I were looking for a weekend getaway in Portland and this is the perfect house to do that. Check in/out was very convenient and Jeannette is great at communicating. We had our own private entrance and the location is just perfect. It is within walking distance to everything but is located in a quite neighborhood. I would highly recommend staying here.

We had a lovely weeklong stay at Jeannette’s home in Portland. The location cannot be beat! We were within walking distance to the beach, tennis courts and beautiful local park overlooking the water. Her home is thoughtfully designed and equipped with everything we needed for our stay. We cannot wait to come back to Maine!

Jeanette’s apartment was great! The location was perfect in a quiet neighborhood in the East End, in prime location to walk to everything. The place was spotless with plenty of room for us. Check in was seamless and Jeanette was very communicative, even putting a guidebook of recommendations together for us. We highly recommend the place!

My stay here was super comfortable and convenient! My boyfriend and I visited Portland for the weekend and were very pleased with the location of the apartment and it’s amenities, it was perfect for just us two. Within walking distance to both east end (which was SO gorgeous) and old port. No issues with parking and found no issues trying to find parking in downtown either. Overall a great experience with Jeannette and would recommend a stay here!!!

My boyfriend & I went to Portland for my birthday weekend and had an amazing stay at Leslie’s apartment. Location was absolutely perfect for everything downtown & the space was adorable. Super clean & perfect for a weekend getaway. Leslie & Abby we’re super easy to communicate with and made our check in/ out very easy. Thank you!!!
Perfect little studio for a solo traveler! I loved having the microwave, fridge, sink and dishes. Everything was nicely kept and the location was perfect.
Great location. Small, but so cozy! The bed is so good!

This is a small bedroom studio perfect for staying in for a visit to the city. It is in a very central location to many things, and the space worked really well despite being small. The host gave clear instructions on how to check in and where to park, which was appreciated.
Great location
A great spot right in the thick of Portland.
Great place great city
Awesome location. Easy in and out each day to explore each day!
Leslie was a great host and the studio was perfectly appointed for our weekend stay! Clean and convenient and easy private entrance! Bathroom tile is super fun too!
We had a great stay! Perfect location and cozy amenities. Thanks for sharing your lovely spot!
Felt like a local staying here. Great for a home base to explore Portland. Nice morning light. The space was clean and comfortable.
Great space, checked in and out without a hitch, lovely and responsive hosts. Would definitely recommend
Perfect Airbnb for walking around downtown Portland. Close to a lot of great restaurants and a museum and the space was as described in the listing. A great choice for a little getaway!

My husband and I enjoyed staying at Leslie’s airbnb! It was in a great location, walking distance to a lot good restaurants/breweries and close to downtown / old Portland. It was nice being a little bit away from the downtown area- quieter and less busy. Leslie gave us helpful recommendations for accessible street parking which we didn’t have any issues with. The airbnb was very cute and clean. Thanks for having us!
Good place to stay! A little small for two people, but overall it was nice! Good location if you are interested in exploring Old Port. It is within walking distance.

Absolutely wonderful location. Very clean. Leslie was very responsive and very helpful. While there is no dedicated parking spot, Leslie have us instructions for nearby free parking prior to our arrival and it was ample. Would definitely stay again!

Peaceful paradise accessible to all that downtown has to offer: my husband and I were so happy with the apartment for our two night getaway. It matched the description, had everything we needed, and the location was ideal. We were able to walk everywhere without having to love the car- we walked to Jibe for spin classes to get drinks and food for any time of day, and did some sight seeing too. It was difficult to find parking but I think that’s just a Portland thing! Thanks for a great stay!
This was the perfect little spot to come back to after exploring Portland and surround areas. Extremely walkable to several neighborhoods, which was a plus! Would definitely stay again.
Nice little spot. Close to everything. Parking is a little tricky, but easy enough to load in and out of the space.
Great location, walkable to many bars and restaurants. The space had everything you would need for 1-2 guests
Highly recommend staying here. Walkable to downtown, very clean, modern and comfortable. Hosts were great and extremely responsive. Thanks for a great stay.

Loved my stay at this cute little apartment. Tiny, but had everything I needed to enjoy my four night stay. The garden was adorable, bed comfy, and the walkability of this place was awesome. Would definitely stay again!

Smooth booking & stay. Place was great for walking and driving to area restaurants. The unit was small (as described) but made good use of every inch. We only were there to sleep, so worked out well. Liked the bright/natural light.
Great place to stay for exploring Portland. Only a 10-15 minute walk from basically everywhere.

The space is very small, but clean and a great location. You can walk to almost everything! It is very quiet. We heard almost nothing. She will give you areas for free parking which we had no trouble finding a spot in and it’s close by.

We liked to stay at Leslie’s place very much. It is well located , in a quiet street, with oldish typical houses. The studio is small, but confortable and well équipped. The bed is confortable. Good Maps are available. As well as water in the fridge and some tea bags. Air conditioning was efficient and welcome. The streets with restaurants and the bistros at the port are at 12 minutes walking. Parking in the streets around the studio is easy.we recommend this place!
Great space, with helpful host.
What an amazing space! Great location so we did not need a car. Comfortable and we had everything we needed. Great communication and very helpful!
Great location for easy access to all of Portland's amazing food, drinks, and destinations. We had a wonderful time during our stay.
Great!
This is a great place in the heart of Portland. Very nice updates and thoughtful extras (sodas, etc.), that Leslie provided.

I loved staying here for a short visit to Portland. Everything in the apartment is well thought out and useful. I appreciated all the details like the lighting and decor, and the hosts went above and beyond by providing shampoo and conditioner, soap, and plenty of towels. Now the only things that hindered our stay was the fact that we did not know the the door to our studio had no lock and there were other rooms or studios in the building, one in same floor, the other one floor down. There is a little patio set right below the ac unit which even I a 5’1” person could stand on the chair or table and climb in.
I understand portland, maine is likely very safe with low crime rates compared to Philadelphia where we are from but since I was traveling only with my tween daughter, we didn’t feel comfortable staying somewhere where the back door can open so easily and where the studio window can’t be closed and the door can’t be locked. I informed the BNB owner immediately and booked a hotel for the next couple nights and unfortunately she did not want to refund any of the amount so I reached out to BNB who luckily was able to help out some. I didn’t get a full refund but likely enough for a couple nights.

Jennifer and Darcy are the epitome of hospitality.

Me and my now Finance, had such a wonderful time staying at Jennifer and Darcy’s. They are such wonderful women and we felt so at home! We felt so cozy in there little backyard garden cottage. Jen and Darcy were excellent hosts and the cabin was so peaceful and well-maintained. Jen and Darcy's cabin was absolutely delightful. Jen and Darcy were communicative and responsive hosts, who provide a peaceful backyard tiny house glamping experience. We were grateful for the great suggestions for where to eat in Portland during our stay, and their pets were very sweet and friendly.

Great stay! Nice location, private and quiet place to sleep and short drives to the sites.
Wonderful little cabin in a lovely garden, very peaceful for sleeping while enjoying all that Portland has to offer!

Jennifer and Darcy were lovely and informative hosts. They gave us a tour of their garden and the vacation space. Their overview of the space and amenities was thorough. Great place, close to all you want to do in Portland. Jennifer and Darcy are available with any questions you may have and will offer great suggestions.

Wonderful wonderful wonderful!

The place is warm and welcoming! as are Jen and Darcy! I thoroughly enjoyed my short stay. I will definitely return to this Garden Cabin next time I"m in town!

My friend and I had a lovely stay at the tiny cabin! It was just the experience we were looking for. Jen and Darcy are super hospitable hosts and we would not hesitate coming back for a stay next time!

Very lovely garden and cabin,
Wonderful hosts.

great little place

beautiful place & beautiful hosts❤️

Cute spot.

Jennifer and Darcy were excellent and accommodating hosts. They’ve created such a beautiful cabin that was the perfect retreat for a quiet night away from home. The garden cottage is wonderful! Jen and Darcy provide a perfect description of what to expect on their Airbnb page but everything is so much more cozy than we could’ve imagined! Would definitely go back - one of the best AirBnB experiences ever!
